name: L'Occitane - Soft Hand Trio
description: Indulge in hand care on the go with our trio of 3 x 30ml travel-sized moisturizers. This set includes Verbena Hand Cream, 20% Shea Butter Hand Cream, and Almond Hand Cream. Nourish and protect your hands wherever you are with these convenient, pocket-sized companions.

name: Narcisso Rodriguez All of me, Eau de Parfum 90ml
description: The one-of-a-kind essence of me. all of me… a daring and prismatic floral fragrance, created for a new generation of women who are confident to show their true colors and embrace all that makes them unique.

name: Secrid Vintage Cognac Wallet
description: Slim and stylish, the Secrid Slimwallet Vintage Cognac Silver fits seamlessly into any pocket. Catering to diverse tastes with a range of colors and styles, its open exterior accommodates 6 extra cards, banknotes, and receipts for ultimate convenience.

name: CONTINENTAL MENS QUARTZ WATCH - ER 2813
description:
This hardwearing timepiece comes with a durable stainless steel strap and
a case made of scratch-resistant sapphire crystal, ensuring longevity. It
features Swiss quartz movement for precise timekeeping, and adds style to
your outfits, whether you’re dressing up for a special occasion
or just going with everyday attire. Water-resistant up to 5 ATM.

name: Xerjoff Uden Overdose, Eau de Parfum 50ml
description: Dance upon the waves of the ocean with Uden Overdose, an enchanting fougere fragrance like no other. Exuding power and strength with every note of Uden Overdose Xerjoff, this perfume is inspired by the tempestuous sea, with enticing top notes of lemon and bergamot. A dark heart of ginger, tobacco flowers and coffee leads to a rich base note of amber and musk.

name: Karl Lagerfeld K/Loom Leather Cardholder
description: This stylish and versatile cardholder features a slim profile and is made with careful attention to detail. Four practical slots let you store your cards safely, while a central compartment ensures extra space for bills and receipts. Its exterior is embossed with a subtle yet impressive KARL monogram and a KARL LAGERFELD logo tab.

name: I WANT CHOO EDP 100ML - ER 2824
description: This powerful, seductive feminine fragrance celebrates the playful and confident woman. Built around the fascinating red spider lily, this floral scent combines soft vanilla notes with the sensual vibes of jasmine sambac. It is balanced by the fruity notes of mandarin juice and velvet peach, and comes in a beautiful, gold-capped bottle.

name: TATEOSSIAN LONDON EVIL EYE AND LEATHER BRACELET SET
description: Dating back 5,000 years, the evil eye symbol is said to ward off negative energy. This set has a beaded bracelet crafted out of black agate which features three “evil eyes” made out of multi-coloured resin. It is complemented by a black double-wrap braided leather bracelet, which fastens with an easy-to-use, push button stainless steel clasp finished with signature Tateossian detailing. Slip on for a stylish accent that brings good luck.

name: CARTIER LA PANTHERE EDP 100ML
description: A gorgeous addition to your dressing table, the feminine Cartier La Panthère is a sophisticated floral fragrance that blends delicate gardenia — an inspired choice of central note for a modern perfume — with sensual musky notes and dried fruit.

name: Bally Smart Wallet
description: Travel with peace of mind with this RFID protection-enabled wallet. This latest style features the new Bally logo and a refined leather design, along with the iconic Bally Ribbon on its exterior. It comes with a sturdy aluminium case that holds up to six smooth or five embossed cards, which can be accessed easily via an external lever. It also has extra capacity for cash and two other cards, making it a reliable companion for your trips.

name: RevitaLash® Advanced Eyelash Conditioner 3.5ml
description: Say hello to healthy, luxurious-looking lashes with this multi-award-winning eyelash serum. Developed by physicians, it uses a patented Curl Effect technology to strengthen your lashes, improve their flexibility and shine, and increase their natural curl.

name: LIP TINTS TO LOVE 2020 LIP TINT TRIP REFRESH
description:
Fall in love with your lips with this full-size trio of 
Benefit’s bestselling lip and cheek tints. This set 
includes three gorgeous, vivid shades including 
Lovetint, a fiery-red shade; Benetint, the iconic 
natural rose tint; and Chachatint, a sheer mango 
hue. Wear them alone or mix and match them 
to create your own custom colour. Glide the 
precise applicator across your lips to instantly 
add a vibrant flush to your pout, and apply 
additional layers to build intensity.

name: RevitaLash® Double-Ended Volume Set – Volumizing Primer and Mascara 11ml
description: This convenient two-in-one product primes lashes, and creates dramatic length and volume with a colour-intense mascara that nourishes while you wear.

name: Forest Essentials Soundarya High Performance Cream With 24K Gold & SPF 30 50g
description: Packed with skin-nourishing ingredients like pure cow’s ghee and 24-carat gold, and active ingredients like hyaluronic acid, polyglutamic acid and vitamin C concentrate, this award-winning moisturiser gives you a natural facelift by firming, smoothing and illuminating your skin.

name: Forest Essentials Gulnar – Rose & Carnation Intense Perfume 50ml
description: Take a stroll through the scented gardens of India. Sweet, floral notes of fresh roses and the spicy warm undertone of carnations invite you to go about your day enveloped in a captivating sensory experience.

name: Kilian Paris Angels’ Share Eau de Parfum 50ml
description: This delicious, warming unisex scent opens with a distinctive accord built upon a blend of oak absolute, cinnamon essence and tonka bean absolute. The long-lasting notes of sandalwood, praline and vanilla make for a delicious finish to an exotic concoction.

name: narciso rodriguez For Her Musc Nude Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: A musky, floral and Oriental fragrance. For this new eau de parfum, the iconic Narciso Rodriguez heart of musk is infused with delicate notes of white flowers and rich tonka bean. Embodying eternal femininity, this sensual fragrance envelops you in a caring embrace.

name: Kiehl's Clearly Corrective™ Dark Spot Solution 50ml
description: Your new favourite go-to fix for dark spots and pigmentation. Formulated with Activated C (a fast-acting form of vitamin C), salicylic acid and peony extract, this serum penetrates the skin rapidly to reduce discolouration and the appearance of acne scars. Suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin.

name: Tom Ford Myrrhe Mystère Eau de Parfum 50ml
description: Perfect for a night out, this warm and spicy unisex fragrance from Tom Ford’s Private Blend collection draws intoxicating notes of mystical myrrh and sweet vanilla together with woody undertones to bestow its wearer with the most luminous aura.

name: Ögon Lady Case Smart Wallet in Rose Gold
description: Security meets elegance with this tough yet lightweight quilted aluminum wallet. Designed to open swiftly in one hand, it fits up to 10 cards and cash, and is RFID-safe, making it the perfect pocket-sized companion while on the go. Size: 10.9 x 7.2 x 1.9cm. Weight: 78g

name: La Mer The Eye Concentrate 15ml
description: With triple the amount of Concentrated Miracle Broth™, this fast-absorbing treatment helps transform the delicate eye area with essential energy and healing hydration to reduce the look of dark circles and lines in 21 days. Lime tea concentrate, the antioxidant powerhouse, helps prevent damage before it begins. The result? An enlightened new eye area — one that looks smoother, brighter and healthier than before. For best results, store the applicator in the fridge before use, for a soothing and refreshing effect.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Libre L’Absolu Platine Eau de Parfum 90ml
description: Light up every room with this fierce, fresh and feminine fragrance. Featuring an intoxicating blend of warm orange blossom from Morocco and minty diva lavender from France, each spritz of this perfume celebrates a woman’s inner strength and freedom.

name: Dolce & Gabbana Velvet Desert Oud Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Dazzling as a sojourn in the desert, this unisex scent envelops you with warm notes of intoxicating incense, mysterious oud and sweet amber. Part of Dolce & Gabbana’s exclusive Velvet Collection, this fragrance comes in a bottle topped with a gold-trimmed velvet cap, and expresses its designers’ olfactive memories and love for Italy. It is the perfect scent for those seeking to charm and captivate.

name: Maison Lancôme Haute Parfumerie Paris Ôud Bouquet Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Warm, sweet, and evocative of a walk through a fragrant forest, this fragrance brings together a trio of woods sourced from three continents: Oud wood that has been aged for 20 years, leathery cedarwood and exquisite facets of patchouli. Lavender, honey rose and vanilla weave themselves in between, creating an arresting scent for men and women.

name: Fossil Carraway Gents Watch
description:
An instant classic, the Carraway is a thoughtfully designed timepiece featuring a two-layered dial. A leather strap with soft nubuck lining and a case that curves to the shape of your wrist makes this watch as timeless as it is comfortable. Two-year
international warranty. 30mm

name: Fossil Watch Ring
description: Every wardrobe needs a statement piece, and this watch ring will become your favourite conversation-starting accessory in no time. Bold like a signet ring, it features a gold sunray dial and a gold-tone stainless steel adjustable band, as well as a two-hand movement. A classy timepiece to add an unforgettable pop to every outfit. Two-year international warranty. 15mm

name: NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer Custard Duo 2 x 6ml
description: Look flawless all day long with this bestselling, award-winning concealer. This multi-purpose corrector is infused with NARS’ signature multi-active botanical blend to offer a luminescent finish and moisturising capabilities. It strengthens the skin while evening out imperfections and blemishes, and can also be used to highlight and contour.

name: Maison Margiela Paris Replica Jazz Club Eau de Toilette 100ml
description: Rum and cigars. Dark corners and secret conversations. Relive the thrill of a night out in a secret jazz club with a charismatic, woody bouquet of rum absolute, vanilla bean, tobacco and pink peppercorn. An irresistible scent for the irresistible man.

name: Maison Margiela Paris Replica Lazy Sunday Morning Eau de Toilette 100ml
description: Reminiscent of lazy Sunday mornings spent lingering in bed, gentle notes of lily of the valley, white musk, powdery iris and ambrette seeds combine to envelop you in the warm embrace of fresh cotton sheets, with the sun gently warming your skin. A delicate fragrance suitable for both men and women.

name: Cabeau Air Evolution Inflatable Neck Pillow
description: Relax and snooze in comfort on your travels with Cabeau’s most compact inflatable pillow. Its soft microfibre cover and ergonomic design supports your head in any direction, and packs away into a case no bigger than a drink can — making it the ideal travel companion.

name: Sekonda Ladies’ Watch & Bracelets Gift Set
description: This three-piece set instantly elevates any look, while pairing seamlessly with other jewellery pieces in your wardrobe. Jazz up your outfit with the rose gold watch — which has a quartz movement, a sunray dial and a gorgeous two-tone alloy bracelet — and the two accompanying rose gold bracelets. Two-year warranty. 17mm

name: Tommy Hilfiger Casual Ladies’ Watch
description: Stay on time and in style. This multifunctional luxe sport timepiece for her features a beautiful woven textured dial and a crystal-encrusted bezel, which find a perfect match in its sporty mesh bracelet. Two-year international warranty. 40mm

name: Scentologia Syn.ergy. Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: This unisex fragrance features a harmonious, tropical blend of juicy mango, orange, pear and cassis, which is balanced by elegant notes of saffron and jasmine before settling down into a sensual base of precious amber and musk.

name: Amouage Guidance Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: This unisex fragrance is the result of spellbinding alchemy between rose, frankincense, ambergris and vanilla. Woody, yet floral, it is a scent that exudes quiet confidence, and envelops its wearer in a soft embrace. Guidance is the winner of the prestigious Best Perfume in High Luxury Award at the Belgian Beauty Awards.

name: Beautypro LED Wand 5-in-1 Anti-Ageing Device
description: Unlock your most youthful skin yet with this 5-in-1 anti-ageing beauty wand. Red and blue light technology, microcurrents, high-frequency sonic vibration and thermotherapy come together to smoothen out fine lines, reduce puffiness, and fade blemishes to reveal clear, glowing skin. Rechargeable and perfect for all skin types.

name: Wonderbalm Multi-Purpose Balm 50ml
description: Meet your new favourite all-in-one skincare solution. This multi-purpose marvel protects your skin as a hydrating moisturiser, lip balm, hand and foot balm, hair mask, aftershave, and more. It comes enriched with olive oil, shea butter and antioxidants, and is 100% vegan-certified and cruelty-free.

name: I Profumi Del Marmo Arabescato Eau de Parfum 50ml
description:
An ode to the highly prized Arabescato marble, this
unisex fragrance will turn heads with the way it blends
passionate energy with understated sophistication.
Fruity top notes of bergamot and pineapple bloom
into a botanical heart of jasmine, before finally settling
into an exotic base of patchouli and musk.

name: Swarovski Mesmera Pendant Mixed Cuts, Green, Rhodium-plated
description: Mesmerising, graceful and elegant. A bold mix of cuts and colours sees a trio of zirconia in varying shapes dangling from a delicate chain. A radiant central stone in hypnotic green holds all the attention, and effortlessly accentuates any outfit.

name: Emporio Armani ID Leather Bracelet
description: This exquisite leather bracelet is designed exclusively for Emirates and has an understated, yet charistmatic charm. It is crafted with supple leather cord, and secures with a sophisticated jewellery clasp. The perfect accessory for adding subtle elegance to your outfit. Two-year international warranty.

name: Sisley Ecological Compound Advanced Formula 125ml
description: Sisley unveils the advanced formula of Ecological Compound, its worldwide bestseller. Drawing on the latest discoveries in the skin’s ecosystem, this product helps rebalance the microbiome and stimulates the skin’s natural defence system. The result: skin that can adapt to and bounce back from daily stress. Strengthened and revitalised, the skin is more resilient and the complexion more radiant.

name: MiLi MiTag with Luggage Tag
description: Introducing MiTag, the world’s first Apple-certified item finder and locator. Slip it into your personal belongings like backpacks, purses or wallets, and attach it to anything from luggage to pet collars, and you’ll never have to worry about losing your valuables again. Once paired with Apple’s Find My app, the MiTag will track your items and give you live updates of their locations. You’ll also receive a notification if you accidentally leave anything behind, so you can travel safely and with peace of mind. Comes with a sleek black luggage tag that secures conveniently to your belongings.

name: Ella K Camélia K Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Sensual and addictive, this fragrance features a pleasing blend of dragon fruit, blood orange and ginger wrapped in a heady mix of vanilla, vetiver and patchouli. An intense bouquet of orange blossom, red camellia and sambac jasmine combine at its heart, for a head-turning scent suitable for men and women. Ella K’s fragrances have been awarded Best Fragrance of the Year by Marie Claire in 2021, and again in 2023 by Fragrantica.com. In 2024, Camélia K was named the winner of the Perfume Extraordinaire award by the Fragrance Foundation UK.

name: Tory Burch The Eleanor Ladies’ Watch
description: Add an effortless touch of glam to your outfit with this sophisticated ladies’ watch. Featuring the signature Tory Burch Double-T logo on the clasp, a sleek gold bracelet strap, an elegant rectangular face and classy hour markers, it is a must-have piece in every wardrobe. Two-year international warranty. 25mm

name: Marlay Coastal Bracelet & Earrings Set
description: Designed exclusively for Emirates, this set comes with a 19cm pearl and gold-plated chunky link bracelet, and two pairs of earrings: one pair features creoles with detachable pearls, and the other is a pair of blossom-shaped studs adorned with cubic zirconia. Wear them together or separately to add a touch of elegance and playfulness to your sunny days. Two-year international warranty.

name: Danessa Myricks Beauty Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder 18g
description: Achieve a long-lasting, shine-free look with this waterproof balm-to-powder formula. Powered by Swedish super ingredient upsalite, it reduces and blurs skin texture, adjusts oil absorption, balances sebum and maintains hydration to ensure a natural glow throughout the day. Wear alone, or over or under foundation for a natural matte finish. Comes in a universal shade to suit all skin types.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Freeze® Gel 7ml
description: Want to keep your brows flawlessly styled even when on the go? That’s not a problem with this innovative, hybrid wax-gel formula. With a dual-action comb applicator that shapes, sculpts and sets brows with extreme precision and hold, you’ll be able to achieve that lifted, laminated brow look in no time at all.

name: Bastille Paris Un Deux Trois Soleil Eau de Parfum 50ml
description: A warm, summery scent that takes you straight to a joyful afternoon in your childhood. Its smoky heart of bitter almond and incense wraps around bright bergamot, grapefruit and pink pepper, before drying down to a base of vanilla, tonka bean and benzoin. Made from 95% natural ingredients, this unisex scent was formulated with your skin in mind, and designed to captivate and uplift your spirit.

name: D1 Milano Polycarbon Black Sketch Watch
description: Visually unlike any other watch, this timepiece was inspired by the spirit of creative souls who are passionate about standing out from the crowd. Intelligently and beautifully designed to look like a sketch from a drawing album, this piece is guaranteed to be a conversation starter wherever you go. 40.5mm

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Dewy Set Setting Spray 100ml
description: Achieve the ultimate dewy glow with this delicious coconut-vanilla-scented setting spray. Its weightless water-based formula seamlessly blends products together while keeping makeup in place, and its gentle formula makes it ideal for those with dry skin. Use alone for a healthy-looking glow, under makeup to prep the skin, or over makeup, to set it and keep it looking fresh all day.

name: Make Up Forever Professional Brushes Trio Kit
description: Apply and blend your makeup professionally with these three essential makeup brushes: The Powder Brush 130, a large, fluffy brush for quick and lightweight applications; the Blush Brush 156, a flat, rounded brush for all cheek applications; and the Blending Eye Brush 216, a medium-rounded brush for use along the lash line and eye creases.

name: Cerruti 1881 Leather Passport Cover
description: Carry your passport in style with this cover made from soft hammered calf leather. It comes with two inner card slots, and subtle lettering in the form of a logo plate affixed on its front. Unisex. Dimensions: 10 x 14 x 1cm

name: Givenchy Gentleman Society Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: For the man who thrives on making his own rules. This new eau de parfum by Givenchy is a bold statement that opens with fresh, aromatic notes of sage and wild narcissus. These are contrasted by the darker facets of vetiver, before cedarwood, sandalwood and vanilla are revealed at its heart.

name: Manta Mirror Hair & Scalp Brush
description: This patented, multi-award-winning five-in-one brush detangles, exfoliates, massages and distributes shampoo and conditioner easily. Its unique design bends and flexes, creating less tension on every strand for minimum breakage. Use regularly when blow-drying hair, on dry hair to enhance shine, and to comb hair into a neat ponytail. Comes with an integrated mirror and a handy travel pouch. The ultimate hair and scalp spa therapy tool for the home and when you’re on the go.

name: Lacoste.12.12 Watch
description: Lacoste reinvents the Lacoste.12.12 for a new generation as it reinterprets the brand’s signature watch in a sleek and minimalist design. With a new rounded and faceted case and matte-finish bezel, the three-hand timepiece comes in a monochrome black colour. Inspired by the iconic polo shirt, the unisex timepiece features a crocodile at 3 o’clock, as well as a petit piqué pattern along the centre of the silicone strap and the outer rim of the bold curved dial. Two-year international warranty. 42mm

name: Boss Candor Men’s Watch
description: Sleek, refined and versatile, the Candor timepiece is a must-have in any wardrobe. Its clean outline gracefully complements both casual and formal looks, while a brushed finish, bold indexes and luminescent details lend a masculine, contemporary touch. Two-year international warranty. 41mm

name: Aviator F-Series Gent’s Smart Technique Watch
description: You’ll always be ready for your next adventure with this multi-purpose watch. With a 1.39-inch full touch screen with 500 nits brightness, health monitoring tools, exercise tracking, and IP67 water resistance, it is made to travel with you wherever you go. This watch can be charged wirelessly, and comes with an extra interchangeable orange silicone strap.

name: Aviator F-Series Gold Eagle Men’s Chronograph Watch
description: With its rose-gold stainless steel case, red accents and genuine leather strap, this sleek timepiece pairs well with both casual and formal outfits. It features a rotating bezel with 24 time zones, luminescent hands, a date display and totalizers. Water-resistant up to 10 ATM. 45mm

name: Martin James London Exquisite Heart of Grandeur Necklace & Earrings Set
description: This versatile matching set will have you feeling and looking amazing from dawn to dusk. Both the earrings and pendant are set with eye-catching cubic zirconia and plated in elegant rose gold, and feature genuine rhodium at their heart.

name: Geske Sonic Thermo Facial Brush | 6 in 1
description: Take your cleanse to the next level with this compact hand-held device. A cleanser, heated brush and facial massager rolled into one, it deep-cleanses your skin more effectively than manual cleansing by channelling 7,500 SmartSonic Pulsations per minute. In combination with its Deep Warming Technology, the brush temporarily opens up the pores for improved absorption of skincare products, resulting in a radiant glow. For best results, use the GESKE German Beauty Tech app to scan your skin, and get customised advice on how to improve your skin in just a few seconds. Clinically tested and developed with dermatologists.

name: Olaplex Nº.7 Bonding Oil™ 30ml
description: OLAPLEX’s ultra-lightweight hair oil uses its patented Bond Building Technology to repair, strengthen and restore healthier-looking hair. It boosts shine, softness and colour vibrancy, while offering heat protection up to 232°C (450°F).

name: Talika Hair Force Serum & Booster LED Device
description: Restore thick and healthy hair with this serum and LED comb roller set. The lightweight, non-greasy phyto-serum delivers essential nutrients straight to the scalp to strengthen hair from the roots, and protects tresses from leading causes of hair loss such as stress, hormonal changes, ageing and skin inflammation. Use with the LED applicator to stimulate healthy hair growth, and enjoy lustrous locks and restored confidence.

name: Cerruti 1881 Regina Necklace & Earrings Set
description: This jewellery set embodies effortless elegance. A stunning mother of pearl inlay gleams from within a gold plated crown-like motif, which is featured on both the necklace and earrings. This regal design catches the light with every movement, adding a touch of timeless sophistication.

name: Kenneth Cole Men’s Automatic Watch
description: A captivating fusion of aesthetics and engineering, this automatic watch boasts precise timekeeping. Its captivating skeleton dial reveals intricate mechanics, and showcases a stunning automatic movement designed with 21 jewels for smooth functioning. The self-winding mechanism is powered by wrist movement, while the 36-hour power reserve underscores itsfunctionality. A two-tone rose gold and blackcase creates a captivating contrast, whilethe comfortable strap ensures all-day wear. 43mm

name: Saint Honore Paris Burj Bracelet
description: A captivating blend of classic and modern design, this bracelet is a true statement piece. The dazzling charm, featuring a six-petal motif, pays homage to the timeless grandeur of the world’s tallest tower. Crafted in gold-plating and lustrous mother of pearl, it adds a touch of depth and brilliance to your look.

name: Fervor Montreal Emerald Fusion Necklace, Earrings & Ring Set
description: Show off your flair for fashion with this eye-catching jewellery set. It comes with a gold-plated Italian-style paper clip chain with an emerald-cut fusion stone, matching earrings, and a size-adjustable ring, all plated in luxurious hypoallergenic 14-carat gold.

name: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil Collection 3 x 7ml
description:
Lustrous looking lips? Check. Lips that feel addictively soft? Double
check. Enriched with hazelnut and organic jojoba oil, these lip oils
care for the lips and leave them beautifully shiny. Comes in three
shades: 01 Honey, 03 Cherry and 04 Pitaya.

name: Timberland Men’s Henniker Watch
description: A multifunctional watch for the modern man. This contemporary timepiece commands attention with its rugged, powerful look. Its matte black face, contrasting hour markers and hands, and a masculine leather strap make this the perfect companion for any adventure. Water-resistant up to 5 ATM. 46mm

name: Tru Virtu Click & Slide RFID Secure Wallet, Riviera Orchidea (Pink)
description: Crafted from fine Italian leather and an aluminium case, this compact wallet is sized slightly larger than a credit card and gives you instant access to five cards at the touch of a button. Store additional cards and banknotes safely in the leather cover. Available in black and pink. Two-year warranty.

name: Buckley London Sapphire Halo Earrings & Necklace Airline Set
description: Timelessly beautiful with an enduring elegance, this set is the perfect gift for that special someone, or as a treat for yourself. The matching earrings and necklace feature sparkling cubic zirconia encircling a sapphire-coloured, cushion-cut stone. Comes in a Buckley London gift box.

name: Parfums de Marly Paris Althaïr Eau de Parfum 75ml
description:
A majestic ode to the luxurious bourbon vanilla, this elegant and
charismatic scent sees top notes of orange blossom, bergamot
and cinnamon wrapped around an enigmatic heart of warm
bourbon vanilla. It is anchored by rich notes of musk, amber and
leather for a long-lasting trail.

name: Jo Malone London Cypress & Grapevine Cologne Intense 100ml
description: This masculine fragrance brings to mind a verdant hanging garden dressed with expansive terraces and noble arches. Top notes of cypress lend an aromatic freshness, while a woody accord of natural cedarwood and vetiver combine with amber and grape for a warm, sensual heart. A base of moss evokes a lush undergrowth damp with fresh rain.

name: Transonic Digital Luggage Scale with Flashlight
description: Avoid unexpected excess baggage fees with this high-precision digital luggage scale, which is designed to measure up to 50kg (110lbs). Equipped with an overload indicator, auto power-off function, and a convenient flashlight, it’s the perfect travel companion. Battery included.

name: Kodak Mini 4" Ring Light
description: Elevate your online appearance with this 10cm ring light that adds radiance, emphasises features, and minimises wrinkles in photos and videos. Perfect for portraits, selfies, virtual meetings and applying makeup, this compact light travels with ease, delivering professional results alongside any smartphone or laptop.

name: Orbitkey X Chipolo Bluetooth Tracker v2
description: The Orbitkey x Chipolo Bluetooth Tracker v2 is here to help you locate your lost keys, phone and belongings, in seconds. Use the button on the tracker to also take selfies through the free Chipolo app. It fits in any Orbitkey Key Organizer, or attach it anywhere with the included tassel.

name: Secrid - Premium Miniwallet, Dusk Black
description: The Miniwallet Dusk is a part of the Secrid Premium Collection, which is designed with the highest standards of materials, craftsmanship, and sustainability. The lever is made from durable stainless steel, and the bottom of the mechanism is finished with a diamond pattern.

name: Sospiro Vibrato 100ml
description: A classy fragrance with sweet floral top notes of Magnolia and Jasmine, uplifted by citrusy Bergamot and Grapefruit. A burst of Ginger and Powdery notes balanced with fresh herbal accents for a mellow aroma. The warm base blends Cedarwood, Amber, Musk, Patchouli, and Orris, creating a complex scent that's subtle yet vivid.

name: Woodwatch  Sailor  Classic - Day, Date And Moonphase Watch
description: WOODWATCH have created the ultimate handcrafted wristwatch from African Redwood. For each environmentally sustainable watch produced, new trees are planted and local communities educated. A commitment to quality and craftsmanship along with the finest style details make the ‘Classic Sailor’ an individual work of art. 2-year global warranty.

name: Robert Wan Tahitian Pearl Pendant on Silver Necklace
description: Sterling Silver Classic 8mm Tahitian Pearl pendant necklace from Robert Wan featuring sterling silver, Tahitian pearl, delicate chain. Pearls should be the last thing that you put on in the morning and the first thing you take off at night. Avoid contact with perfumes or creams, and simply wipe with a soft cloth to clean. Made in French Polynesia

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Freeze® Styling Wax
description: Your secret to feathered, locked-in brows. Introducing our strongest brow hold yet! Brow Freeze™  by Anastasia Beverly Hills is an extreme-hold brow styling wax that lifts, tames and sculpts every hair in place. This universal clear formula provides long-lasting hold that instantly gives the look of lifted, feathered brows.

name: Michael Kors Pyper Two-Tone Watch
description: Michael Kors' Pyper watch features a white stamped MK logo dial with glitz indexes, silver-tone case with gold-tone pavé bezel, three-hand movement, and two-tone steel bracelet, and is the perfect addition to your wardrobe. 2-year global warranty.

name: Ralph Lauren Ralph's Club, Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: An exclusively crafted, authentically masculine eau de parfum that balances elegance and subtle irreverence with the highest quality natural ingredients. Fresh notes of lavandin and clary sage complement the warm richness of Virginia cedarwood and luxurious vetiver for a sensual woody scent.

name: Thameen London Rivière, Extrait de Parfum 100ml
description:
A Rivière is a classic necklace comprised of gemstones that are of identical size or seamlessly graduated. Just as the necklace, this fragrance is inspired by balance and a flawless progression.
Top notes: Indian black pepper, cinnamon
Heart notes: Turkish rose, Indonesian patchouli
Base notes: Oud accord, Indian cypriol

name: Giorgio Armani Sì Passione éclat, Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: A passion-infused, bold and radiant fragrance that encourages you to reveal your inner strength. Blackcurrant accord and bergamot are empowered by two roses for generous femininity and character. A Giorgio Armani fragrance crafted with the utmost respect for people and for the planet.

name: Penhaligon's Scent Library, Eau de Parfum 10 x 2ml
description: The nose is all too often neglected when it comes to education. But no more. Rejoice in 10 diminutive samples of Penhaligon’s most fabulous fragrances. A veritable library of nasal erudition, suitable for everyone.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium, Eau de Parfum 90ml
description: Discover Black Opium, the provocative fragrance for women from Yves Saint Laurent. A glam rock fragrance full of mystery and energy, this is an irresistible gourmand floral with notes of black coffee for adrenaline, white florals to seduce and vanilla for sweetness and sensuality — all bound by a warm undertone of white musk.

name: Versace Dylan Purple Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Versace Dylan Purple is a bright, elegant and feminine fragrance. A fresh fruity opening gives way to its floral heart. Finally, vibrant woods and the elegance of musk sign the fragrance.

name: KARL LAGERFELD Ikonik Choupette Exclusive Jewellery Set
description:
Add a playful touch to elevated, everyday looks with this
delicate pendant necklace and stud earrings in pure sterling
silver by KARL LAGERFELD. Featuring the Ikonik Choupette
charms, this slim style is perfect for layered jewellery looks.

name: Merlin Cube Mini Projector
description: For movie and video game buffs. The Cube Mini portable projector comes with an HDMI port and is ideal for both indoor and outdoor screenings, as well as PowerPoint or office presentations. Connect your home theatre or surround sound system for an elevated sound quality.

name: Square Gear Cufflink
description:
Inspired by the movements of mechanical watches, this
timeless cufflink features a square shape made with
white rhodium plated finishing. It frames five individual multicoloured gears, three of which rotate by touch. Decorate your sleeve and add a fun element of movement that perfectly complements your watch.

name: uTalk All 150+ Languages - 1 Year Access
description:
Have you ever wanted to be able to speak some useful words and phrases while you are traveling? Well, uTalk can help you start speaking like a native within minutes. Using the uTalk learning app, you can listen to native speakers to help you navigate your next vacation or business trip.

With over 150 languages for you to discover and 60 fun and engaging topics within each language, you can join over 30 million people who have used uTalk’s tried-and-trusted language learning method. You can learn any of our languages in your own language too, so whether you are a Spanish speaker who wants to learn Arabic, or a French speaker who wants to learn Urdu, we’ve got you covered. uTalk works on iOS, Android, PC, Mac and Web browser,
and it’s really easy get started.

Get access to all of uTalk’s languages for 1 year for a special Emirates price of only $50, usually $99 — a 50% saving.

name: Lancôme Le 8 Hypnôse Serum-Infused Volumizing Mascara
description: Experience a revolutionary vision of mascara powered by Lancôme science: A breakthrough formula made of 91% active black balm and 8 revitalising amino acids encapsulated in pure glass. Instant sculptural volume. Stronger, fuller looking lashes in 4 weeks.

name: Rosefield The Boxy Women's Set
description: A fresh take on The Boxy watch, these two new duotone styles are a nod to modern luxury. Each watch has either a white sunray etching dial and a stainless steel strap combining 2 metals - silver/rose gold or silver/gold. Stay bold with these mixed metal classics. As a special edition, each of these styles is packed in a Rosefield signature pink box.

name: Festina Chrono Bike Special Edition Men's Watch
description:
No, chronographs are not just for athletes! FESTINA extends the offer with this sophisticated and trendy timeless chronograph special edition watch with date. Inside the case lies a Miyota movement and the watch features a Mineral crystal and a stainless-
steel 47 mm case. Water Resistance 10 Bar (Swim).

name: Nuxe Huile Prodigieuse Multi-Purpose Dry Oil Inflight Collector 100 ml
description: Experience the iconic cocktail of 7 precious 100% botanical oils in Huile Prodigieuse® to nourish and repair the face, body and hair in a single step. A product to nourish your glow for beautifully soft skin. It infuses your skin with an irresistible satin sheen with no oily finish thanks to its inimitable dry touch texture. Light scent of sun-kissed sand.

name: Fervor Montréal St. Tropez Set of 2 Cuff Bangles
description: The perfect set for night and day. A classic Cuban link bangle in a high polish brass finish and the elegant mariner link brass bangle enhanced with brilliant cubic zirconias satisfy both ends of the make-a statement spectrum. Use these 18K gold plated cuff opening bangles (size adjustable) to finish off an elegant ensemble or dress up a casual look.

name: M. Asam® Magic Finish Make-Up Mousse Set 30ml + 10ml
description: The M. Asam® MAGIC FINISH Make-up Mousse individually adapts to many skin tones. The exceptional silky, light make-up texture wears like a second flawless skin. Hiding unevenness, wrinkles and redness, the skin looks silky smooth. No powder is needed, as it naturally mattifies the skin. The international bestseller is suitable for all skin types.

name: Designer Shaik Opulent Shaik No.77 Parfum For Men, 100ml
description: Indulge in regal luxury with Parfum crafted by the Prince of the Desert. This award-winning fragrance embodies the daring and romantic Shaik persona craved by men and women. Woody, spicy, and citrusy notes exude irresistible masculine elegance. Designer Shaik refill service ensures timeless indulgence. Treat yourself or your loved one to this exquisite Parfum.

name: Cerruti 1881 Rendinara Ladies Watch
description: Crafted with a gold-plated stainless steel case, the Rendinara features a sleek dial with elegant accents and ultra-feminine details. The white mother-of-pearl dial with sparkling stones on the bezel, offers a style statement like no other.

name: Alexandre J Imperial Peacock, Eau De Parfum 120ml
description: One of the favoured motifs of the Art Nouveau era, the decadent beauty of the peacock is reflected in this exquisite fragrance. Perfect for those with a flair for flamboyance.

name: Bvlgari Petits & Mamans,  Eau De Toilette 100ml
description: Inspired by the joyful, precious moments between mothers and children. This eau de toilette is a tender reminiscence of the sweetest childhood memories featuring notes of mandarin, white peach and vanilla. Suitable for children aged 3 and over

name: Bvlgari Man Rain Essence,  Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Bulgari Man Rain Essence is an invitation to experience the unstoppable creative force of water through the transformative and regenerative power of rain. A fresh woody musk signature paying homage to the thrilling and invigorating lively trail of this natural element in an olfactive crescendo.

name: Bally Fabazia Reversible Belt
description: Skilfully crafted in Italy from calf leather, the sleek Fabazia reversible belt will switch instantly from black to chocolate brown, with a quick twist of the buckle, which has enamel detailing and a cutout metal style.

name: Lancome Idole Now, Eau de Parfum 100ml
description:
One spritz sparks an urge for change. Discover the florality reinvented, thanks to the green sciences: 
Less waste.Less resources. More floral facets. More addiction, less heaviness: upcycling less waste, bio-tech less damage, bio-tech less resources.

name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Supercharged Gel-Creme 15ml
description: Every day, your eyes are exposed to environmental aggressors like blue light, pollution and lack of sleep. Our supercharged gel-crème fights the effects of modern life with double action to target dark circles and reveal brighter, more wide-awake eyes. This silky, gel-creme formula is lightweight and fast-absorbing, making it ideal under makeup.

name: Erborian - Skin Therapy Oil 30ml
description:
Elevate your skincare with this multi-perfecting night oil!
Suitable for all skin types, it rejuvenates, unifies, and deeply moisturizes, while unveiling a radiant, youthful glow each morning

name: Luminox Leatherback SEA Turtle Giant
description: Embark on adventures with this 44mm Swiss Made Luminox watch. Luminox's Light Technology ensures a readable dial in the dark for up to 25 years without charging. The case and case back are crafted from ultra-strong CARBONOX™ material. With a water resistance of 10 ATM, this watch is your reliable companion for underwater journeys. Two-year global warranty

name: Haus of Dietrich Portofino Set
description:
Crafted with exquisite attention to detail, this beautiful bracelet features vibrant rainbow-colored cubic zirconia stones set in a sleek and stylish design. The matching ear studs are perfect for completing the look and adding some extra sparkle to your ensemble.
Handmade in Italy / 925 Sterling Silver / 18 karat gold plating / 16 + 3 cm length.

name: SWAROVSKI TENNIS BRACELET  - ER 2783
description:
Dazzling from every angle, this gorgeous bracelet is
comprised of a complete circle of crystals in a rose goldtone
plated setting. Each individual crystal wonderfully
reflects the light, making your wrist the centre of attention
wherever you go. Perfect as a timeless collectible piece
for yourself, or as a gift for someone special.

name: Swarovski Crystalline Ballpoint Pen
description: This ballpoint pen by Swarovski features a powerful and romantic design. The color scheme of rose-colored lacquered metal and rose-gold tone plating lends it an air of elegance. Numerous Swarovski crystals fill the pen, making it sparkle brilliantly. A small, heart-shaped charm showing the word 'LOVE' is surrounded by beautiful crystals.

name: SWAROVSKI CRYSTALLINE AURA WATCH - ER
description: Combining form and function, this effortlessly elegant watch sees more than 1,300 crystals framing its face for a brilliant, illuminating effect. A whitesilver tone dial and champagne gold-tone casing and bracelet complete the timepiece, along with the iconic Swarovski swan motif gracefully sitting at 12 o’clock. Water-resistant up to 5 ATM.

name: AMAN Nourishing Silk Cocoon Face Cream
description: Beautifully scented with jasmine and rose, this rich face cream contains silk amino acids, which soothes and smooths the skin is proven to help revitalise skin cells. Combined with organic beeswax and the moisture-boosting properties of wild-harvested argan oil, it leaves the skin smooth and hydrated. An ideal night cream.

name: Creed Green Irish Tweed, Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: A classic gentleman's perfume, Green Irish Tweed is a woody fresh scent inspired by the lush green countryside estates and Creed's equestrian tailoring roots.

name: Police Polysh watch Set with Bracelet
description: Built to turn heads, the watch and bracelet set from Police is crafted for the bold-spirited. Versatile in design and extremely urban, together, they are sure to add a rugged and dynamic edge to any ensemble.

name: Parfums de Marley Layton Royal Essence, Eau de Parfum 75ml
description: Layton is a fragrance which captures the essence of the debonair. This seductive oriental ,floral fragrance with an intense olfactory signature opens with bergamot and its tangy passion, while lavender and geranium blend into a fresh note, chic and chivalrous all at once. The intensity of the eau de parfum is further amplified by amber, enhanced by  natural elegance of pink pepper.

name: Tommy Hilfiger Tommy, Eau de Toilette 100ml
description: Tommy Eau de Toilette is an effervescent woody scent, capturing the freedom and optimism of a road trip in America. American treasures, notes of crisp apple and warm cinnamon add a thread of nostalgia and comfort. At the heart, refreshing and joyfull mandarin contrasts with edgy patchouli. Balanced by soothing lavender and ambery cedarwood.

name: Tommy Hilfiger Tommy Girl, Eau de Toilette 100ml
description: Tommy Girl Eau de Toilette is an effervescent floral scent, capturing the freedom and optimism of a road trip in America. American treasures, opening with an invigorating burst of all-natural spearmint and bergamot. At the heart, a bouquet of jasmine and rose create the feeling of pure happiness. The scent finally reveals sensual accord of creamy sandalwood, warm amber, and musk.

name: Creed Carmina, Eau de Parfum 75ml
description: Carmina Eau de Parfum is the latest strikingly modern amber floral Women's Fragrance from Creed. Sensual Rose de Mai and cashmere wood meet plump black cherries and pink pepper, wrapped in saffron's golden warmth. With myrrh, frankincense, amber, and musk, its feminine allure and charisma in a powerful scent.

name: Memo Paris - Marfa 100ml
description: Marfa. A destination with a unique destiny. Its bottle emblazoned with a wide-open eye provides the first clue. Deep in the Texas, Marfa beckons the eye and holds its gaze. Marfa has a power of attraction like no other, like the tuberose Absolute: a bewitching, lingering, unforgettable flower. Marfa evokes the singular nature of this white-hot land.

name: Clarins Self Tan - Radiance plus Golden Glow Booster 15ml
description: Easy-to-apply self tanning drops for the face—formulated with 95% ingredients of natural origin—that delivers an even, long-lasting tan 365 days a year. A concentrated formula that builds in intensity with every drop, so you control the glow—from sun-touched to deep bronze. Just 2-3 tanning drops mixed with any face moisturizer, and you’re golden!

name: Buckley London - Hepburn Set
description: Add charming style to your look with the Hepburn Set. The bracelet features shiny beads and a delightful selection of charms adding a wonderful shine. The stud earring trio includes polished designs, each expertly crafted and finished with high quality crystals. The chic pendant features four charms, suspended from a fine silver-plated snake chain for a contemporary twist.

name: Augustinus Bader - The Eye patches
description: Revitalizing hydrogel eye patches that instantly hydrate, brighten, and plump, while reducing the appearance of dark circles, fine lines, and hyperpigmentation. Powered by TFC8® , Trigger Factor Complex TFC™.

name: Yolo Y-Pro Universal Active Stylus Pen
description: Enhance your touchscreen experience with this active stylus. Universally compatible with any device, this white stylus boasts an ultra-accurate 2mm tip that lets you tap, swipe and draw on your device with the highest precision and speed. Its sleek design, replaceable tip and a long battery life of up to 12 hours ensures your workflow never gets interrupted.

name: MAKE UP FOREVER HD Skin Face Essentials Palette
description: Your favorite face palette is back! 6 cream foundations and 6 cream blushes to unify, contour and color your cheeks. Our 12 shades are buildable, lightweight and blend super well all together without feeling or looking cakey at all. This palette is so easy to use!

name: Off-White SOLUTION No.8, Eau de Parfum 50ml
description: Off-White™ SOLUTION No. 8 Eau de Parfum, an amber floral by Emily Bouge, leans into spice with saffron, pepper, and vanilla, with dove-gray serving as its exterior shade.

name: Cartier Pasha de Cartier Noir Absolu, Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Unexpected, bold and mysterious: a charismatic fragrance for a successful man. Enclosed in an elegant ultra-black bottle, this fragrance opus asserts its powerful and addictive scent, around an accord of burning wood and caramelized sugar.

name: ANNE KLEIN ROSE GOLD AND STEEL WATCH  - ER 2775
description:
This stunning rose gold and silver two-tone watch features an octagonal
face and a white mother of pearl dial as an alluring centrepiece. Premium
crystals adorn its bezel and hour markers to add a touch of sparkle. The
dual-tone band brings a dose of sophistication, and secures effortlessly
with a fold-over buckle closure. Water-resistant up to 3 ATM.

name: Dr. Levy Contour Pro + Freezing Gel
description: Based on Dr. Levy’s injectable techniques, this revolutionary sculpting set provides professional-level recontouring in 10 minutes. Uniquely combining Electro-Muscle Stimulation with age-reversing Radio-Frequency, it will, after one use only, visibly elevate the face’s silhouette and tighten skin from the muscles up.

name: The Merchant of Venice Andalusian Soul 100ml
description:
Andalusian Soul is dedicated to the Muda di Barbaria evoking the warmth of the sunny lands of Morocco and Spain. 
Rum and fresh acacia recalls the spirits made in ancient times in Malaga. Sensual vanilla, amber and sage are enriched by the sublime mix of raw materials with smoky and balsamic touches developing in an audacious and fascinating scent.

name: Jawhara Pearl Necklace
description: Captivate hearts with the simplicity of the Worood Necklace: an 18K solid gold masterpiece, embellished with the delicate natural mother of pearl derived from the Arabic word “flower”. This pendant showcases the iridescent beauty and expertly crafted by skilled artisans. Destined to be a timeless symbol of grace and sophistication.

name: Jawhara Eclat Bracelet
description: Through the elegant 18K solid gold Eclat bracelet adorned with the allure of natural mother of pearl, "shine" and "radiance" are merged into the world of elegance, creating a timeless symbol of simplicity, and beauty. Every glance becomes a poetic hymn to luxury and nature, where opulence dances with the rhythms of the earth.

name: Mobilesteri 8-in-1 Multitool Travel Essentials Kit
description: This compact 8-in-1 multi-functional kit combines storage, charging, card slots, adapters, transmission and phone stand functions into one device. It includes a USB-C to USB-C retractable charging and sync cable, various charging adapters (including Lightning, Micro-USB, and USB-C to USB-A), a SIM card ejector pin, a Nano SIM card storage slot and a phone stand function for watching videos while on the go. One-year international warranty.

name: Hugo Boss Gregor Chronograph Black
description: The BOSS Gregor is a sophisticated chronograph with date function that reflects the confidence and daring of the BOSS man. Offering a contemporary interpretation of a classic case shape, the 45 mm chronographe watch is fitted with a choice of crocodile-pattern leather strap in a black color. An elegant domed crystal protects the sunray face of this elevated and sporty timepiece.

name: Tom Ford Oud Wood, 50ml
description: A precious ingredient in a perfumer's arsenal, Oud Wood blends with Sandalwood, Vetiver, exotic Rosewood and Cardamom. Tonka bean and Amber add warmth and sensuality.

name: Jo Malone Cologne Collection 5x9ml
description: A collection of five travel-sized Jo Malone London fragrances (9ml), designed to wear solo or pair together. Wrapped in a gift box to surprise someone special or keep for yourself. Gift collection contains: English Pear & Freesia Cologne 9ml, Peony & Blush Suede Cologne 9ml, Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne 9ml, Lime Basil & Mandarin Cologne 9ml, Pomegranate Noir Cologne 9ml.

name: Tom Ford Ombre Leather, 100ml
description: OMBRÉ LEATHER exudes tactile sensuality with rich, black leather, textured with Patchouli and Vetiver, envelopes like second skin.

name: Versace L'Homme, Eau De Toilette 100 ml
description: A sensual, fresh perfume for a man of outstanding virility. An Eau de Toilette derived from an artful combination of Versace classical origins and modernity.

name: Issey Miyake L’Eau D’Issey Pour Homme Eau De Toilette Travel Set 2X40ml
description:
A fresh, vibrant and elegant Eau de Toilette. A timeless fragrance with a very masculine signature. 
When the vibrating freshness of Yuzu meets Sandalwood.

name: Elizabeth Arden Trio Lip Protectant Sticks
description: This all-weather treatment stick helps moisturize, soften and smooth your lips relieving chapping and cracking

name: Elizabeth Arden Face & Eye Duo 30/30 Capsules
description: Our triple-strength Advanced Ceramide duo bolsters natural collagen and repairs the look of delicate skin to deliver a lifted, smoother and brighter look

name: Swarovski Millenia Octagon Cut Blue Drop Earrings
description: These pierced earrings are refined and striking, guaranteed to spark conversation. With elegant white pavé crystals and a blue dancing stone, finished with a rhodium-plated setting, they steal the spotlight day or night. Part of the Millenia Family for Collection III, wear with denim, tailoring or evening wear.

name: Swarovski Millenia Octagon Cut Blue Necklace
description: Expertly engineered with a dancing stone mechanism, this pendant moves with you. Its blue, octagon-cut stone is framed with smaller crystals and a rhodium-plated setting. Part of the Millenia family by Creative Director Giovanna Engelbert for Collection II, style with a simple white tee and jeans to transform an everyday look into something extraordinary.

name: Tumi Alpha Multi Window Card Case
description: From the Alpha collection, this card case features both interior and exterior ID windows and numerous card slots. Comes in an elegant gift box.

name: Calvin Klein Iconic Unisex Watch
description: Iconic style. Slim, structural case design and two-layer dial accented with the Calvin Klein acronym. This watch comes with a 2-year international warranty

name: La Mer The Treatment Lotion 150ml
description: This next-generation watery lotion delivers a rush of liquid energy to jumpstart your regimen. Its Active Liquid Hydrogel texture penetrates rapidly to deliver energy and sustained all-day hydration to optimize skin for the full benefits of every treatment that follows.

name: La Mer The Moisturizing Creme 60ml
description: The hero, the icon, the original moisture miracle. Ultra-rich moisturizing cream with an instant dewy finish. Its mere mention inspires intrigue, adoration and a cult-like devotion. Skin looks instantly radiant and naturally balanced as imperfections fade.

name: Roc Boost of Hydration Routine
description: Quench your skin’s thirst with our Hydrate & Plump heroes powered with Hyaluronic acid for a hydrated and plumped skin in just 1 night!

name: Naj O Leari Il Portamonete Verde Acqua make up palette
description: Inspired by a classic accessory — the coin purse — this original face, eye and lip palette is a compact and convenient beauty essential for those on the go. With four eyeshadow shades, two blush tones, a highlighter, a lipgloss and three lipstick hues to choose from, you can create numerous contemporary makeup looks that pair with any outfit.

name: Nooz Original Rectangular Reading Glasses (Black, +2 Prescription)
description: Enjoy crystal-clear vision wherever you go with these armless reading glasses. Designed by ophthalmologists, they are made of lightweight polycarbonate for comfort and durability, and feature a soft, anti-slip silicone nose bridge. They can be kept away easily in bags or pockets, or fastened to keychains

name: Hermes Nomad Collection - Jardin 4X 15ml set
description: Discover four iconic Herm?s Parfums-Jardins fragrances. Nestled in their orange box, four travel size 15 ml bottles invite you on an olfactory escape. The Parfums-Jardins collection brings the best selling scents in a travel size of 15 ml each, including - Un Jardin a Cythere, Un Jardin sur le Nil, Le Jardin de Monsieur Li and Un Jardin sur la Lagune

name: Dolce And Gabanna Q 100ml
description: Q by Dolce & Gabbana is a fragrance with fruity notes, enriched by a strong woody base. The fresh taste of Sicilian Lemons combined with the contrasting sweet and sour flavours of Cherry gives the perfume a refined yet bold scent for the modern woman seen as a Queen.

name: Dolce And Gabanna K 100ml
description: Intense, magnetic and sensual, a fragrance that offers an intimate glimpse into the heart of a modern king. K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum has a vibrant woody base conveyed by the Nagarmotha wood and a sensual spicy heart of pimento essence enhanced by the freshness of the Cardamom and is sublimated by a creamy touch of a Fig Milk accord for a sensual perfume for men.

name: Transformulas Voluptuous LipVolume
description: Providing non-invasive lip plumping minus the risks that come with fillers. Comprising collagen stimulating peptides, this shimmering gloss delivers fuller lips, alongside a minty fresh refreshing peppermint oil. The non-sticky serum holds in the lips moisture and ensures voluminosity, without the dryness, irritation and bruising caused by injectable fillers.

name: Boadicea The Victorious Blue Sapphire, Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: A regal fusion of citrus highs and green accord melded with hints of rose, cardamom, jasmine, oud, patchouli and amber. Created to honour the 65th wedding anniversary of Queen Elizabeth ll and Prince Philip, this is a fragrance founded on loyalty, harmony, friendship and trust - the qualities embedded in this precious gemstone.

name: Bronzallure Adjustable Tennis Bracelet -Red Zircons
description: The premium consumer jewelry creation by Bronzallure Italy. Warm, timeless, feminine. 18k rose gold plating over the proprietary Golden Rose blend with Ruby red Zircon.

name: Brosway Corinto Set
description: Corinto’s large medallion and ring, inlaid with intricate swirls and white zircons, are sure eye-catchers. The set is crafted from rhodiated brass. The ring is adjustable.

name: Any Di SunCover
description: Keep your sunglasses safely protected and always at hand with the world’s first eye accessory, carefully handcrafted with soft leather and punctuated with 24 carat gold-plated hardware. The ANY DI SunCover fits any shape and size of glasses and is a fashion statement that shakes up every look!

name: Boadicea The Victorious Heroine EDP 100ml
description: Indisputably heroic, Heroine conjures up images of routed Romans and victories celebrated for many days on end. Join that mood of celebration with Heroine, an eau de parfum that takes no prisoners, conquering all with its intoxicating top tier of bergamot, dewberry and vivacious violet leaves. As in battle, there is intrigue at play, personified by heliotrope and heady mimosa, with tactical incursions of powdery orris, vanilla sugar and prized tonka bean in the dry down. Feel like a modern day hero with this courageously bold fragrance.

name: Urbanista Sydney BT Speaker
description: Get your groove on while at the beach, in the park or in between festival gigs. The Sydney BT speaker allows up to five hours of uninterrupted crystal clear and deep sound with sleek functions such as Bluetooth, volume controls and second speaker pairing. Compatible with both iOS and Android and easy to carry in the hand or slip into your pocket.

name: Aigner Ladies Wallet Fango
description: An eye-catching and practical companion in the Aigner all-over logo pattern. The purse is suitable for every bag and is equipped with a coin and a bank note compartment as well as three credit card slots. Travel retail exclusive.

name: Aigner Ladies Leather Bracelet Set
description: This unique bracelet set features two coloured leather bracelets: an all black bracelet and arose coloured bracelet. Both bracelets close with burgundy-coloured edges and the Aigner logo clasp. Travel retail exclusive.

name: Garmin Venu Sq
description: Personal trainer: check. Health monitoring: check. Style quotient: check. Whether you want to plan a workout, gauge your blood oxygen or track hydration, respiration or stress, the Venu Sq GPS smartwatch can do all this and more. The bright colour display and six-day battery life make the stylish smartwatch even more practical.

name: Ella K Lettre De Pushkar 100ml
description: The exoticism, rich colours and powerful traditions of India captured in this heady fragrance. An enticing blend of saffron, nutmeg and cinnamon balanced with vetiver, patchouli and oud.

name: Diamanti Per Tutti Dark Secret Set Earrings & Necklace - M1440/M1441
description: Radiate positivity with this set of 18 carat yellow gold-plated sterling silver earrings and necklace, featuring hand-set black onyx gemstones and natural white diamonds. Black onyx transforms negative energy and encourages good fortune. Comes with two-year full warranty.

name: Elie Saab Le Parfum 90ml
description: Glowing of femininity, Le Parfum unveils a chypre and floral fragrance a radiant Orange Blossom and Jasmin bouquet combined with an addictive Honey Rose and a patchouli heart. An ode to light, Le Parfum symbolises elegance.

name: Baroque and Rose Pure Face Tonic
description:
Perk up your face with the fresh Organic Pure Face Tonic which gives instant brightening and toning. Restore your skin’s PH balance while deep cleaning impurities, leaving behind 
 just radiant skin.

name: Fierro Collection Laila Rose Gold Plated Jewelry Set
description: Invoke divine protection with this ancient evil eye symbol. The rose gold-plated pendant features concentric circles of blue, black, white and yellow pavé set crystals, paired with matching studs. Comes in an elegant gift box. One-year warranty.

name: Apple USB-C to Lightning Cable
description: Connect your iPhone, iPad, or iPod with Lightning connector to your USB-C or Thunderbolt 3 enabled Mac for syncing and charging. You can also use this cable with your USB-C Power Adapter to charge your iOS device and take advantage of the fast-charging feature on select iPhone and iPad models. *This product is excluded from any ongoing promotions.

name: Infinity Lola Lock & Key Jewellery Set
description: The playful padlock and key is a must-have in every diva’s jewellery collection. With exquisite lock and key studs and matching necklace, Lola is a collection for the show girl in all of us! Comes with a one-year international warranty.

name: Infinity Alice Pendant, Bracelet and Earrings Set
description: You don’t have to peer through the looking glass, Alice is here at Infinity & Co! Enter a wonderland of playful, hearts, clubs and spades. Exquisitely hand-set micro pave lend an elegant touch to this beautiful drop pendant, bracelet and earring set. Comes with one-year international warranty.

name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Soft Glam Eyeshadow Palette
description: If you’re dashing from boardroom to party, the Soft Glam Eyeshadow Palette lets you easily transform your look. Thanks to a highly pigmented formula, the 14 shadows are easy to layer and blend until you get your desired result. The snugly fit dual-ended make-up brush and mirror make it ideal for trips.

name: Fierro Collection Earring & Necklace pack of 9
description: Featuring nine pairs of earrings in rhodium, rose gold and 18-carat gold plating, embedded with lustrous crystals and pearls. The rose gold crystal heart pendant completes the look no matter which pair you choose. One-year warranty.

name: Shiseido Ultimune Power Infusing Concetrate 3.0, 100ml
description: A potent, antioxidant face serum with a lightweight formula that visibly reduces signs of ageing, amplifies hydration and boosts radiance in three days. This hydrating serum is powered with rosella extract, heart leaf extract, reishi mushroom and iris root extracts that protect and rejuvenate your skin.

name: Acqua Di Parma Signature Sakura Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Embrace the Orient with the rich scent of the sakura flower. Combined with notes of bergamot, pink pepper and jasmine sambac, Sakura evokes a spectacle of blossoming cherry trees.

name: Tommy Hilfiger 3 Dial Parker Watch
description: Modern casual Tommy Hilfiger Watch with multifunction, day, date, 24 hour quartz movement brown smooth leather strap watch with 46mm stainless steel case. Water resitant up to 5 ATM and comes with 2-year international warranty.

name: Olivia Burton 3D Bee Embellished Strap Watch with Watercolour Scarf
description: Inspired by the influx of beads, gems and jewels on the catwalk, this unique wrist watch makes an instant style statement. Featuring a striking bezel with a dainty bee embellishment and a beautiful silk scarf - prepare to welcome compliments wherever you go.

name: Paco Rabanne Phantom Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: Gentlemen will feel energised and powerful with Phantom’s notes of lavender, lemon and woody vanilla. The futuristic robot bottle is also the brand’s first ‘connected’ one. Tap your phone on its NFC chip-embedded cap and connect to the digital Phantom universe, featuring exclusive content curated by Paco Rabanne.

name: Givenchy L’Interdit Eau de Parfum, 80ml
description: Givenchy introduces its new fragrance L’Interdit. A tribute to bold femininity. An invitation to defy convention and embrace your singularity. Feel the thrill of the forbidden with a bouquet of white flowers and intense earthy notes of patchouli and vetiver.

name: K by Dolce & Gabbana, 100ml
description: Be the king of your life. Express your intensity, magnetism and sensuality with K by Dolce&Gabbana Eau de Parfum. It includes a vibrant woody base conveyed by nagarmotha wood and a sensual spicy heart of pimento essence enhanced by the freshness of cardamom.

name: Valentino Voce Viva Eau de Parfum, 100ml
description: Valentino Voce Viva Eau de parfum is a radiant feminine perfume that combines the sound of your voice and scent of your fragrance, celebrating your individuality. The perfume is a harmony of couture orange blossom and golden gardenia paired with colourful Italian bergamot and mandarin.

name: Pour Femme Versace Dylan Turquoise Eau de Toilette, 100ml
description: Spritz on some sunshine with the bright Dylan Turquoise. A scent for grey days, this light and fresh fragrance balances zesty mandarin and lemon with sensual hints of wood and musk.

name: Benefit They’re Real! Magnet Duo Mascaras
description: Perfect your lash look with They’re Real! Magnet Extreme Lengthening Mascara. Add drama, volume and length with the custom zigzag bristles that separate and define lashes in a jiffy.

name: Benefit 2 Brow Bigshots
description: Beautifully shaped eyebrows are now just a swipe away. Fill in your brow line with the Precisely, My Brow Pencil and use the 24- hour brow setter to sculpt the hair into place. Presto... natural-looking, defined brows!

name: Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge 540, Eau de Parfum 70ml
description:
The iconic, bestselling Baccarat Rouge 540 is born from the encounter between Maison Francis Kurkdjian and Baccarat
to celebrate the crystal manufacturer’s 250th birthday. Its woody scent creates poetic alchemy, with a highly condensed and graphic signature suitable for everyone. Jasmine and saffron are complemented by ambergris notes and woody tones of cedar.

name: Givenchy Gentleman Reserve Privée, Essence de Parfum 100ml
description: A new, unique floral-woody fragrance, co-created by master distillers and perfumers. For the first time, the savoir-faire of two olfactory worlds is combined to create an intense men’s cologne for the strong and sophisticated gentleman. Delicate iris and amber with a fiery pepper essence combine to create pure and timeless elegance.

name: Acqua di Parma Colonia, Eau de Cologne 100ml
description: Originally created in 1916, Colonia is an iconic, unisex cologne that symbolises sophisticated Italian lifestyle in a universallyloved, citrus blend. Instantly recognisable lemon, bergamot and orange are amplified by lavender and rose with aromatic rosemary. Notes of vetiver, sandalwood and patchouli round off a warm and woody base. A timeless classic scent for everyone.

name: Benefit Double the Volume, Volumizing Mascara Duo
description:
Thanks to its gravity-defying formula, you get massive
volume without weighing down your lashes. It provides an
intense black shade, is smudge-proof and water-resistant,
and its custom big slimpact! brush is streamlined to reach
root-to-tip, corner-to-corner, and both upper and lower
lashes for big volume with 360° reach.

name: Cerruti 1881 Ruscello Ladies' Watch
description: Driven by the contemporary style of watch making, the Ruscello collection focuses on essentials with undeniable style and measurable aesthetics. The intense details of the stainless steel metallic bracelet, multi-functional blue dial and crystal encrusted bezel is the starting point of this masterpiece, which allows a clear view of inner and outer perfection.

name: Kenneth Cole Gents Automatic Watch
description:
Demonstrate class effortlessly with Kenneth Cole’s latest
offering. This timepiece boasts a self-winding automatic
mechanism with a skeleton display, drawing attention to the work of the complex gears within.

name: Aigner Stainless Steel and Yellow Gold Ladies' Watch
description: Infused with charm, elegance and charisma, this Swiss-made timepiece comes with Aigner’s iconic horseshoe shaped case, a white mother of pearl dial accentuated by multiple   logos, and a two-tone bracelet made of stainless steel and yellow gold. Water resistant up to 5 ATM. Two-year international warranty.

name: Cerruti 1881 Lucardo Men's Watch and Bracelet Set
description: Embodying a rich masculine energy, the striking Cerruti 1881 Lucardo is a stylishly sporty watch with a navy blue silicon strap, a dashing matte navy dial and contrasting white indexes. This timepiece, paired alongside a matching cable bracelet, pushes fashion standards a notch up.

name: Formulae Prescott Tri-Balm 3-in-1, 70g Stick
description: A luxurious facial balm which cleanses, exfoliates and moisturises in one simple step. A bespoke, natural formulation using the purest ingredients, created after three years of intense research and development, Tri-Balm nourishes and nurtures the skin to give a healthy glowing complexion.

name: Maserati Competizione Men’s Watch
description:
The Competizione collection sees a multi-function watch
with classic lines. The 43mm case with a knurled bezel
envelops the sunray dial, while the face is presented
in hues of blue with luminescent hands and day, date
and 24-hour markers. The steel bracelet’s dual finish
gives this watch a timeless look, and is suitable for
any situation. Water resistant up to 10 ATM. Two-year
international warranty.

name: Aigner Stainless Steel and Blue Dial Men's Watch
description: Exude classic elegance with this timepiece. Made with the true gentleman in mind, it comes with a textured leather strap and a stainless steel case enhanced with a deep blue dial and multiple   logos. Water resistant up to 5 ATM. Two-year international warranty.

name: Memo Paris Irish Leather, Eau de Parfum 75ml
description: Like a nod to the Irish origins of Memo Paris’ co-founder, this unisex fragrance blends his leather accord with the windy freshness of juniper berries and green mate absolute.

name: Estelle&Thild SuperBioActive Brightening Serum, 30ml
description:
This powerful anti-ageing organic vegan treatment helps brighten and reduce the appearance of dark spots and discolouration through its high concentration of active ingredients including the microalgae antioxidant Astaxanthin.

Result: Luminous, younger looking skin with a healthy complexion and even skin tone.

name: O.R.S Hydration Tablets – Lemon 12 Tablets
description: Did you know that flying can decrease your hydration levels much faster than usual? O.R.S Hydration Tablets are specially formulated to replenish electrolytes, and provide glucose and essential minerals to help you overcome travel fatigue and stay energised. Simply drop, dissolve and drink two tablets with water to arrive at your destination feeling your best.

name: Clogau Always in My Heart Affinity Bead Bracelet
description:
A beautiful symbol of two hearts entwined, bonded and
unbroken. This stretch bracelet is made from sterling silver and 9-carat rose gold — a stunning interpretation of everlasting love.

name: Clogau Kiss Pendant
description:
A perfect gift for a loved one. This beautiful, delicate
pendant is crafted from sterling silver, finished with
9-carat rose gold and set with sparkling zircons.

name: Buckley XO Pendant and Bangle Set
description:
Add a touch of polish to your outfits with this quietly
sophisticated set. Comprising a necklace, earrings and
bangle, it is handcrafted with various cuts of cubic zirconia.

name: Bellroy Hide & Seek RFID Wallet
description: A slim all-rounder with classic good looks and clever hidden storage for extra bills, coins or business cards.

name: Augustinus Bader The Rich Cream, 50ml
description:
This highly concentrated, deeply moisturising cream is
powered by our proprietary TFC8® — a blend of natural
amino acids, high-grade vitamins and synthesised
molecules naturally found in the body. It works to revive
the complexion and help soothe dryness for skin that
looks and feels smoother, softer and more supple.

name: D1 Milano Ultra Thin Watch
description: CNC 316L stainless steel case and bracelet. Engineered with only 6.2mm thickness and 110g of lightweight material. Adorned with a pop of brilliant blue circular brushed dial to elevate an irresistible radiance beyond dimensions.

name: Zinvo Rival Aquamarine Quartz Watch
description:
Make an impression with the Rival Aquamarine, created
exclusively for Emirates. Featuring a classic design paired with exquisite detailing, this timepiece is both modern and elegant.

name: Fierro Allure Watch and Double Bangle Set
description: Exude sophistication with this luxurious rose gold plated watch. Featuring high precision Japanese movement, it is matched by two eye-catching bangles adorned with radiant crystals and enamel. Packed in an elegant gift box. Water resistant up to 3 ATM. One-year warranty.

name: Haus of Dietrich Infinity Necklace & Earrings Set
description:
Handmade in Italy, this set is crafted from 925 sterling silver and gold vermeil. It features a 43cm pendant necklace with a delicate tassel knot, and matching drop
earrings that add glamour to every look.

name: Gant Sussex 44 Men's Watch & Card Holder Gift Set
description:
Renowned for sporty, yet classic keepsakes, Gant’s Sussex 44 watch continues this tradition with a timepiece featuring a 316L denseweave stainless steel bracelet and folding clasp, a three-hand function, scratch resistant glass and
100-metre water resistance. A Gant card holder comes as a gift for you. Two-year international warranty.

name: MiLi MagSafe Compatible Bluetooth Speaker
description: This is the world’s first portable magnetic Bluetooth speaker that can be attached to your MagSafe compatible device or to any other flat nonmagnetic surface using the provided adhesive metal ring. Compatible with all devices, this speaker supports Bluetooth pairing and provides 360° surround sound — all while packed into a sleek, compact design.

name: Travelmate Dubai City Audio Guide
description:
Immerse yourself in authentic local culture. This audio guide offers historical, interesting and essential information about Dubai and the region, and is available in seven languages: Italian, English, French, German, Spanish, Russian and Mandarin Chinese. Includes product activation
code and downloadable data for offline use. App must be downloaded separately from the App Store or Google Play.

name: Twelve South AirFly Pro Bluetooth Stereo Receiver & Transmitter
description: AirFly Pro lets you use wireless headphones with inflight entertainment. Simply plug AirFly Pro into the headphone jack on a plane or on the treadmill at the gym. With the flip of a switch, you can also send music wirelessly from your iOS or Android device to a car’s AUX IN or any amplifier with a LINE IN. USB charging cable, airline adapter and travel pouch included.

name: Emirates A6-EDA Aircraft Skin Tags (Set of 2)
description:
Keep a piece of history — literally — in the form of limited
edition tags made from the skin of Emirates’ very first and now retired Airbus A380. Crafted from the wingtip assembly of the plane, the front sides feature the image of the aircraft and the Emirates logo against a grey background, while the backs include details of the plane’s journey against a green background. Includes a certificate of authenticity.

name: Montblanc Explorer Eau de parfum 100ml
description: In a gorgeous leather bottle with the Montblanc logo, this scent kicks off with pink pepper, bergamot and sage and leads to a heart of leather and wood. Its aromatic direction is reinforced by the base, which tours through amber notes and patchouli.

name: Terre d’Hermès Eau de toilette 100ml
description: A classic that's stood the test of time, this scent pleases, come rain or shine. A bright start of orange and grapefruit moves to an intense heart of pepper and pelargonium (lemon balm). Cedarwood creates a smooth close.

name: Cartier La Panthère Eau de parfum 75ml
description: A sophisticated floral fragrance, La Panthere blends delicate gardenia an inspired choice of central note for a modern perfume with sensual musky notes, dried fruit, strawberry and apple.

name: Emirates Remove Before Flight Keyring Pack (Set of 3)
description: Something for true fans of aviation. This trio of keyrings celebrates our fleet, and is inspired by the safety ribbons seen on aircraft doors. They measure 12.5 x 3cm each.

name: Chopard Oud Malaki Eau de parfum 80ml
description: A fusion of eastern and western influences, Oud Malaki opens with grapefruit, Artemisia and lavender. In the middle, leather mingles with tobacco and spices, while the base belongs to woody notes, including oud.

name: Bang & Olufsen E8 Earbuds
description: Take the tangles out of your headphone experience with B&O wire-free earbuds. The intuitive design lets you start/stop, change tracks, take calls and activate voice commands at the touch of a button. Enjoy up to 16 hours of playtime and easy recharging with the Qi enabled leather case.

name: Haus of Dietrich Sparkling Flower Set
description: Hand-produced using 22-carat gold-plated sterling silver, the earrings and 88cm necklace in this set are finished with intricate crystals, a design aspect influenced by the stars in the Tuscany sky.

name: Haus of Dietrich Charlottenburg Silk Set
description: Comprised of a series of soft silky chains crafted from 18-carat gold plating, this elegant necklace measures 96cm and can be worn long or doubled. In this set it's matched by a 22cm bracelet, with both pieces produced by hand.

name: KYBOE! Chronograph Empire Watch
description: The oversized dial of this bold design is protected by a rose gold-plated case and scratch-resistant glass cover. The face flashes with LED lights at each of the hour stops and comes with luminous hands and a date window. Two-year international warranty.

name: World SIM Duet
description: If you want to use a local SIM on your travels or stop carrying an extra phone for work, the Duet is the device for you. The size of a credit card, it converts your mobile into a dual-SIM phone via Bluetooth. Buy now and get a prepaid SIM worth $20, which provides low call rates in over 180 countries.

name: Ray-Ban Folding Wayfarers
description:
Genuine since 1937, Ray-Ban’s iconic sunglasses are synonymous with style, protection and practicality.
Modelled on the original Wayfarer, these sunglasses are cleverly designed to fold over and be tucked away when you aren't wearing them. With highly durable frames, Ray-Ban's Folding Wayfarers mean you don't need to sacrifice fashion for convenience. Comes in a high-quality leather case.

name: Parfums de Marly Delina Eau de parfum 75ml
