description: A floral bouquet headed by Turkish rose, Delina is composed using raw materials of exceptional quality and contrasting notes of flowers, fruits and woods.

name: Michael Kors Jaryn Watch
description: Thanks to the timeless rose gold-toned finish on the super-slim strap, this watch has an air of contemporary elegance. The classic mother-of-pearl analogue dial is highlighted by sparkling crystals, while the watch is water-resistant to 5ATM and has a two-year international warranty.

name: Bergson Ocean Watch
description: Score brownie points for sustainable fashion. The Ocean watch’s two-toned strap is woven from recycled bottles. For every purchase, Bergson donates to a marine conservation. Water resistant upto 3ATM. Two-year international warranty.

name: Amouage Interlude Eau de parfum 100ml
description: A rich fragrance that smoothly balances chaos and disorder with harmony, Interlude opens with zesty bergamot and oregano countered by aromatic amber, frankincense, leather, patchouli and sandalwood.

name: Ray-Ban Aviator Classic Gold
description:
Genuine since 1937, Ray-Ban’s iconic sunglasses are synonymous with style, protection and practicality.
Originally created for U.S. aviators, the Ray-Ban Aviator Classic design is iconic. Gold frames make these shades effortlessly stylish, while green G-15 lenses provide optimum visual clarity and 100% UV protection.

name: Emirates Fly Better Luggage Tags (Set of 2)
description: Locate your bags with ease with our distinctive luggage tags. This twin set features our flagship A380 aircraft and Fly Better logo on the front, and name and address windows on the back.

name: Emirates Little Travellers Luggage Tags (Set of 2)
description: Make the little ones’ first travel experience a memorable one with these adorable holiday accessories. Featuring our delightful Little Travellers pilot and cabin crew member. Also ideal for kids’ lunchboxes, backpacks and schoolbags.

name: Boadicea The Victorious Valiant EDP 100ml
description: Zesty, sumptuous, utterly unique. From the Exclusive Collection of Boadicea The Victorious, Valiant harnesses the purity of the world's finest ingredients in a beautifully crafted bottle. Top notes of orange and bergamot offer luxury in every spritz and leave the wearer feeling an alluring sense of adventure.

name: Lancôme Idôle Le Parfum 75ml
description: Created by female perfumers from around the world, this modern fragrance has a core of floral rose, accompanied by spotless jasmine for a clean and intense scent, enveloped with citrusy bergamot, juicy pear and pink peppercorn.

name: Maserati  Potenza Ladies Watch
description: A 35mm case in stainless steel with yellow gold PVD treatment contrasts a striking silver watch face featuring Maserati's iconic trident logo, complemented by a sleek leather strap. Water-resistant to 10ATM and comes with a two-year international warranty.

name: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay P2 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Rich sound, with premium materials in an ultra-lightweight package, Beoplay P2 is your personal Bluetooth speaker. Whether you are in the office or your home, the built-in microphone and powerful speaker make Beoplay P2 ideal for taking and making hands-free calls on your phone or computer. Got a request for Siri or the Google Assistant? Then enjoy full voice activation with a single tap. Say goodbye to your smartphone's inferior speakers. Tuned by Bang & Olufsen's expert engineers, Beoplay P2 is ready to enhance your audio experience with surprisingly rich sound in such a small package.

name: Hugo Boss Legacy Watch
description: A vintage-inspired watch by BOSS, designed in stainless steel with a textured bezel. This vibrant accessory contrasts a bold blue sunray-brushed dial with an Italian-leather strap in a warm hue with tonal stitching for casual appeal. Large hour markers and architecturally sculpted hands offer an easy read in low light.

name: Zaha Hadid Twist Collection Ring Necklace by Tateossian
description: Celebrated for their contribution to contemporary design and jewellery, Zaha Hadid Design and Tateossian have collaborated on a collection of wearable art to celebrate thirty years since the founding of Tateossian. The star piece of the collection is the Twist Necklace, which can be worn on a chain or as a ring to suit every style. Chain length 66cm; ring size 19mm (medium).

name: Buckley Grace Polished Pendant, Earring & Bangle Set
description: The Grace collection brings sparkle to your style. The set, which features a necklace, earrings and bangle, is handcrafted with various cuts of cubic zirconia set into highly polished gold bands. The chain is 40cm with a 7.5cm extender.

name: Clogau Tudor Court Bracelet
description: Influenced by Hampton Court Palace, the heart of the Tudor Court and home of flamboyant King Henry VII, a heart-shaped quatrefoil motif hangs from the bracelet and is made from sterling silver and 9-carat rare Welsh gold.

name: Clogau Tudor Court Locket
description: Inspired by the intricate carvings on Anne Boleyn's Gateway at Hampton Court Palace, the locket hangs freely and elegantly from the heart. The heart pendant is fashioned from sterling silver and rare 9-carat Welsh gold and opens to reveal a stunning quatrefoil rose-gold charm.

name: Narciso Rodriguez Narciso Pure Musc Eau de parfum 100ml
description: The 'for her' signature heart of musc is expressed in its purest version, addictive and sensual.

name: Versace Crystals Duo - Bright Crystal + Yellow Diamond 2 x 30ml
description: Two precious creations from Versace Parfum's "crystals collection". Bright Crystal and Yellow Diamond are fresh, light and elegant bouquets for confident sensual women.

name: TRU VIRTU® Click & Slide Hi-Tech Wallet
description:
Slightly bigger than a credit card and made from Italian leather in classic black with an aluminium case, this compact piece gives you instant access to your cards without having to open the wallet and also has space for additional cards and notes. Made in Germany, this wallet fits 12 cards: 5 in the aluminium case and 7 in the envelope.
RFID-protected Size: 9.9 x 6.7 x 2.1cm Weight: 88 grams

name: Creed Aventus Eau de parfum 100ml
description: A worldwide bestseller since its release in 2010, Creed Aventus is a rich, fruity infusion that combines Calabrian bergamot and Calville apple top notes with a middle of patchouli and jasmine and a base made up from bourbon vanilla, musk and ambergris.

name: Buckley London Mixed Earring Set of 8
description: Featuring eight styles in gold, rose gold and silver tones embellished with a series of crystal accents, this pretty set (suitable for pierced ears only) offers a variety of looks you'll love, including heart shapes, hoops and drops.

name: Buckley London Aspire Pendant, Earring & Bangle Set
description: The ideal accessory for any outfit, this set consists of a pendant, half-hoop earrings and bangle. Each piece shines with pave crystals and rhodium plating, wrapped between gold-plated bands. The chain is 40cm with a 5cm extender.

name: Maserati Potenza Watch
description: Showcasing their iconic trident logo on the dial, second hand and screw crown, Maserati's timepiece is designed with a stylish rose gold-plated stainless-steel case and contrasting black silicone strap. The watch comes with a two-year international warranty.

name: ÖGON 3C – Carbon Card Clip
description: The 3C is the ultimate slim wallet with a unique functional design weighing just 15 grams. The amazing characteristics offered by carbon fibre makes it strong and light.

name: Dr. Levy Intense Eye Rescue 15ml
description: Give the skin that surrounds your eyes a visibly smooth complexion and youthful glow with Intense Eye Rescue's Eye Booster Concentrate, an exclusive travel set developed in Switzerland and the world's first-ever patented cosmeceutical cream scientifically proven to boost dermal stem cells. Vegan-friendly, developed for men and women, free from mineral oil, cruelty-free, includes free twin tech BeautifEye Spa.

name: Fervor Montréal Watch and Jewellery Set
description: Features a rose gold-plated watch and matching earrings, studs, ring and necklace. One-year warranty.

name: Kiehl's Midnight Recovery Concentrate 50ml
description: An elixir of pure essential oils and distilled botanicals, the paraben-free serum, suitable for all skin types, 'visibly restores the appearance of skin by morning' to replenish your skin's moisture levels by 99.8%. How? Through an elixir of pure essential oils and distilled botanicals, including  lavender, evening primrose and squalene.

name: Kiehl's Ultra Facial Cream 50ml
description: Kiehl's number one facial cream provides a 24-hour hydration boost for healthier-looking skin. A non-greasy formula with glacial glycoprotein and olive-derived squalene to restore skin's moisture barrier, it absorbs quickly, hydrating even the driest areas and is suitable for all skin types.

name: Philip Stein Sleep Bracelet
description: Designed to be worn at night and prolong the stages connected to restfulness, this revolutionary sleeping aid is powered by Philip Stein's Natural Frequency Technology. A small metal disc set into the bracelet, this piece of tech picks up natural frequencies from the environment and channels them into the body. This process produces melatonin to get the deep sleep you deserve.

name: Centurio Carbon Fibre Cufflinks
description: Add visual drama to any shirt with these stainless steel, ion-plated cufflinks inlaid with etched carbon fibre.

name: Hermès Elixir des Merveilles Calligraphie EDP 100ml
description: This special-edition bottle was designed by Narjes Noureddine, an Emirati calligrapher with a modern style. The scent is contemporary too, with warm notes of candied orange, chocolate and vanilla.

name: Creed Windflowers Eau de Parfum 75ml
description: Inspired by movement, Wind Flowers is a floral and fresh eau de parfum from the House of Creed. This feminine fragrance opens with sweet jasmine, wrapped around the zesty scent of Tunisian orange blossom and softened by a fruity peach note. A powerful heart of delicate jasmine flower, tuberose petals and a soft rose extract add depth and texture to this fragrance, while a warm flurry of sandalwood is twisted around a haze of iris and musk. A vibrant note of orange blossom and creamy praline offsets this dusky floral scent, bringing to life this luminous fragrance.

name: Merlin Travelmate Pro GaN Turbo 65W PD Adapter
description: Made with the globetrotter in mind, this 65W power delivery universal travel adapter comes with one USB-A and two USB-C output ports that provide fast charging for up to four of your favorite electronic devices, including the latest generation laptops of 2024. It is designed to ensure the safety and efficiency of your devices, with built-in safety functions that protect your devices from overheating and overcharging. Gallium Nitride (GaN) technology allows this charger to work up to four times faster than conventional chargers. Supports plug types in: USA, Japan, Australia, China, UK, Germany, France, Greece, Finland, Norway, Sweden and over 150 destinations

name: Creed Queen of Silk Eau de Parfum 75ml
description: This captivating new women’s fragrance from The House of Creed embodies the opulent lustre and ethereal softness of silk — a precious fabric treasured since time immemorial for its beauty and delicate touch. Weaving together sublime Chinese osmanthus, decadent tuberose and ethereal Javanese patchouli, it transports you to distant lands through which this ancient treasure once journeyed. These heady notes dance over complex cedar, agarwood and smoulderingly soft Madagascan vanilla in a lingering, sensual tribute to timeless refinement.

name: SEIKO 5 Sports Automatic Watch
description: This stylishly retro watch offers authentic lines with both durability and all-day excellence. Providing automatic technology that you control with every movement, this versatile watch is powered by a 24-jewel movement that beats at a frequency of 21,600 vibrations per hour, with a power reserve of approximately 41 hours and manual winding capability. 10 bar, 100M Water Resistant.

name: Smart Games IQ Puzzler Pro
description: This global favourite puzzler features 12 distinct, colourful ball elements that must be cleverly placed on the playing field. Elevate your flight experience and challenge yourself with 120 tasks across five difficulty levels. Suitable for children aged six and above.

name: Merlin Kids’ Smart Watch & Fitness Tracker
description: Designed specially for kids, this fitness tracker is a fun way for little ones to tell time, and for parents to monitor their activity. It measures heart rate, monitors sleep and activity, and more, and the watch face can be customised via the Keep Health app. Suitable for children aged 6–15 years old. Built-in charger included. Pairs with iOS and Android.

name: Emojem Kids’ Charm Bracelet
description: Emojem transforms the world of jewellery with a fun and quirky twist, drawing inspiration from the lively language of emojis. This delightful 18-carat gold-plated bracelet enables kids to effortlessly express their emotions through eye-catching charms, each capturing a unique sentiment in a playful and fashionable manner.

name: Izipizi Paris Kids’ Sunglasses
description: Keep little ones sun safe with sunglasses offering 100% UV protection. Suitable for kids aged five to 10. Storage pouch included with each pair.

name: Harry Potter Bracelet
description: Carry magic on your wrist. This silver-plated Harry Potter bracelet features film-inspired charms and measures 19cm in length. Charms can be removed and are replaceable with charms from other major brands. Warranty included.

name: Fervor Montreal Once Upon a Time Kids’ Jewellery Set
description: The perfect starter jewellery for little ones. Be transported to a magical world of princesses and fairies with this set of four gold-plated and enamelled pendant necklaces and four pairs of matching earrings.

name: Frederic Malle Portrait of a Lady Eau de Parfum 100ml
description:
This feminine fragrance is a charismatic portrait of the modern woman. It opens with a dazzling bouquet of Turkish rose, before settling into an enchanting heart of blackcurrant, raspberry and
clove. Notes of patchouli, sandalwood and frankincense round off its base, making for a timeless addition to your fragrance collection.

name: NARS Climax Mascara in Explicit Black 6g
description: This best-selling mascara delivers buildable volume, lift and length without any clumping. A full-bodied brush with ribbed bristles coats each lash thoroughly for an intense effect, while a smooth and creamy formula elevates your lashes without stiffness or heaviness.

name: Drunk Elephant Lala Retro™ Whipped Cream 50ml
description: Lala Retro™ Whipped Cream is an all-purpose, loving rescue cream that helps the skin retain long-lasting moisture, while forming a protective layer that allows it to function at its optimal level. Packed with skin-nourishing ingredients such as a triple ceramide blend, African oil blend and omega acids, this whipped cream helps defend the skin against everyday stressors. It is fragrance-, silicone- and cruelty-free, and is formulated at a skin-friendly pH level of 5.2. Use day and night for soft and moisturised skin.

name: narciso rodriguez For Him Vetiver Musc Eau de Toilette 100ml
description:
This fresh and woody vegan eau de toilette is for the man who
enjoys being one with nature. Enchanting from the very start,
it opens with notes of cypress, nutmeg and spicy cardamom,
which slowly unfurl into a sensual heart of musk before finally
settling into a base of vetiver, cedarwood and patchouli.

name: Issey Miyake Le Sel d’Issey Eau de Toilette 100ml
description: Le Sel d’Issey by Issey Miyake is the new masculine eau de toilette with a powerful freshness. The fragrance of eternal movement, from the sea to the land, is expressed by two olfactive polarities, featuring a vibrant salt accord enhanced by intense woody notes. Vegan-certified, Le Sel d’Issey is 95% made with ingredients of natural origin and is refillable. The bottle is designed by Tokujin Yoshioka and embodies a pure aesthetic that captures the vitality of salt.

name: Lancome UV Expert Supra Screen Invisible UV Serum SPF 50+ 40ml
description: Prevent signs of photoageing with this invisible UV serum that protects the skin against UVA, UVB and pollution. Its patented formula offers SPF 50+ protection, and is powered by an active complex comprising 3% niacinamide, 1% vitamin E, and 3% green tech dandelion. Its quickabsorbing, ultra-lightweight texture leaves an invisible finish on all skin tones, and is suitable for all skin types.

name: Kiehl's Truly Targeted Blemish-Clearing Solution 15ml
description:
Banish stubborn blemishes with this invisible liquid acne patch.
Formulated with 2% salicylic acid, niacinamide and liquorice root, it
helps to rapidly visibly reduce pimple size, redness and post-blemish marks, while promoting a radiant finish. Created using Kiehl’s exclusive “liquid patch” technology, it forms a breathable seal that layers seamlessly under sunscreen and makeup.

name: Sol De Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum® Cream 75ml
description:
This award-winning, deliciously-scented body cream is the ultimate Brazilian beauty secret. A guarana extract-rich formula softens and
tightens the skin, while a blend of cupuaçu butter, coconut oil and açaí helps to keep your skin nourished and healthy. A caramel and
pistachio scent will keep you smelling delicious all day long.

name: Drunk Elephant D-Bronzi™ Anti-Pollution Sunshine Drops 30ml
description: Get a sun-kissed glow with this omega- and peptide-rich serum that boosts the skin’s defenses and promotes elasticity while delivering a bronzy finish that flatters the complexion. D-Bronzi™ is loaded with antioxidant compounds like cocoa and white tea extracts, and replenishing virgin marula and black currant seed oils that nourish the skin while protecting it against environmental stressors. With just a drop or two, this silicone-, fragrance- and cruelty-free product will leave your skin with a glowy, vacation-worthy finish.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Flowers & Flames Eau de Parfum Florale 90ml
description: A sensual and bold reinterpretation of the iconic Libre range, Flowers & Flames opens with a fresh burst of lavender and bergamot before blooming into a heart of lilies, palm flower and juicy orange blossom. Magnetic base notes of vanilla and musk make this an eau de parfum for the lady looking to leave an impression.

name: Kayali Oudgasm Miniature Set Eau de Parfum 4 x 10ml
description:
Crafted with passion and inspired by founder Mona Kattan’s
intense love for oud, this miniature set allows you to experience Kayali’s Oudgasm Collection. These unisex scents were designed to magnify the beauty of oud and explore the infinite universe of layering possibilities. Intense, sensual, and luxurious, each of the four fragrances offers a modern twist on the art and rituals of Middle Eastern fragrance layering.

name: Valentino Born in Roma Uomo Green Stravaganza Eau de Toilette 100ml
description:
Inspired by the cool green gardens of Rome, this fragrance is
for the gentleman who seizes every day with vigour and energy.
It bursts into life on the first spritz with a top note of zesty
Calabrian bergamot, which gives way to a bold heart of coffee.
An earthy base of vetiver rounds out this fougère fragrance,
and gets you ready for a new day of adventures ahead.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Myslf Le Parfum 100ml
description: Made for the confident and sophisticated gentleman, this complex and intense fragrance opens with an arresting black pepper accord. This gives way to a radiant heart of orange blossom, before settling into a sensual vanilla base. A woody and floral scent that is bold, yet beautifully nuanced.

name: Dolce & Gabbana Devotion Eau de Parfum Intense 100ml
description: This feminine fragrance is the latest addition to the Dolce&Gabbana Devotion olfactory story. Featuring fresh orange blossom and vanilla notes with a gourmand touch of hazelnut, it revisits the original fragrance with deeper and more enveloping notes. The scent is housed in a vibrant amber tinted glass bottle beautifully adorned with the symbolic Sacred Heart, celebrating the brand’s unwavering dedication to Italian design and craftsmanship.

name: Rabanne Million Gold Eau de Parfum Intense 100ml
description:
Flamboyant, edgy and sleek, this fresh and woody fragrance
was made for the fashionable man. Top notes of juicy mandarin,
an earthy heart of cedarwood and a seductive base of sandalwood channel the ecstatic energy of success and power.

name: Voya Nerolia Eau de Toilette 50ml
description:
Embodying the essence of the wild Irish coastline, this uplifting
scent for women whisks you away to walks on soft sand dunes along the beach. Its delicate notes of honeysuckle, neroli and citrus come in a pebble-shaped bottle that is designed to resemble the
organic forms of sea glass.

name: Voya Tempest Eau de Toilette 50ml
description:
Inspired by the mesmerising coastline of Ireland’s Wild Atlantic
Way, this fragrance for men blends bergamot, pepper and
white florals to create a smooth, yet spicy aroma that intrigues
the senses. It comes in a tactile, pebble-shaped bottle that is
beautifully designed to resemble the organic forms of sea glass.

name: Kyoto Pearl Classic 7–8mm Freshwater Pearl and Chain Bracelet
description: This bracelet complements any outfit with its chic and timeless elegance. Its 925 sterling silver, 18-carat gold-plated chain bracelet is adorned with handpicked freshwater pearls that shimmer in the light, making this bracelet a versatile addition to your jewellery collection. Perfect as a gift for a loved one.

name: Lancome Génifique Ultimate Serum 50ml
description: The ultimate skin repair solution, this lightweight, fast-absorbing serum targets redness, fine lines and promotes smoother skin in just one week. Formulated with powerhouse ingredients like pre- and probiotic fractions, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin Cg, this award-winning product helps protect the skin from external stressors, leading the way to more youthful-looking skin.

name: Sol De Janeiro Cheirosa 62 Hair and Body Fragrance Mist 90ml
description:
Named after the Portuguese word “cheirosa”, which means to smell irresistibly good, this hair and body fragrance mist is a warm and delicious creation bursting with an alluring pistachio and
salted caramel scent. Spritz on at any time of the day for a burst of alluring aroma.

name: Ralph Lauren Polo 67 Eau de Toilette 75ml
description: Embodying the spirit of athleticism, this fresh and powerful eau de toilette was designed for the determined gentleman who dares to dream. Notes of Calabrian begamot, geranium, vetiver and sandalwood wrap this fragrance in pure sensuality, radiance and warmth.

name: Diptyque Discovery Set of 5 Eaux de Toilette, 5 x 7.5ml
description: A gift set that becomes a journey. Inside, Do Son, L’Ombre dans l’Eau, Eau Rose, Eau des Sens and Philosykos portray five olfactory landscapes, allowing the thousand and one facets of these floral perfumes to find expression alongside woody notes. Perfect as a gift for others, or a treat for yourself. Suitable for everyone.

name: Kyoto Pearl Freshwater Pearl Studs (Set of 3)
description: Set in 18-carat gold-plated 925 sterling silver, these handcrafted freshwater pearl earrings are suitable for any occasion. They come in a set of three different pearl sizes (4mm, 6mm and 8mm), and can be worn as matching pairs or mixed and matched to accessorise your outfit in a dynamic fashion.

name: MZ Skin Vitamin-Infused Meso Face Mask, Box of 5
description: Improve your skin texture and get a radiant glow with this antioxidant- and vitamin-packed face mask. Nourishing ingredients like aloe leaf juice, liquorice extract and vitamin C reduce inflammation and soothe the skin, while hyaluronic acid attracts and retains moisture to leave the complexion plump and hydrated. Skin tone is rejuvenated with brighteners that stimulate skin cell renewal, tackling age spots, dull skin, sun spots and blemishes. Perfect to use before makeup or as a calming treatment.

name: R.O.C.K.S. The Original Rocks Beverage Chilling Stones, Set of 6
description: Say goodbye to watered-down drinks! These handcrafted solid granite stones cool your beverages down to the perfect temperature for enjoyment — without the dilution that comes with ice. Enjoy the full flavours of your drinks, just as their makers intended. Comes in a set of six rocks.

name: Lacoste.12.12 Ladies' Watch
description:
This contemporary watch brings the design details of Lacoste’s iconic polo shirt to the world of watches with a sporty, minimalist
interpretation. Sleek gold hands and the brand’s signature logo sit within a round case, while a petit-piqué pattern adorns the silicone
strap. Water-resistant up to 5 ATM. Two-year international warranty. 36mm

name: Boss Skytraveller Men’s Watch
description:
Sporty and sophisticated, BOSS’ take on the classic pilot’s watch comes with beautiful design details like a diamond-cut reflector ring, a sleek black dial and calfskin straps. Chronograph and date-time functions lend this classy timepiece an extra touch of
functionality. Water-resistant up to 5 ATM. Two-year international warranty. 44mm

name: Make Up Forever Rouge Artist For Ever Red Lip Kit
description: The iconic red lip, now easier to achieve than ever. Rouge Artist For Ever lipstick offers a unique pro-like application thanks to its precise bullet shape, while the Artist Color Pencil offers high-pigment, waterproof, 24-hour comfort wear. Define your lips with the Artist Color Pencil Extreme, then apply Rouge Artist For Ever on top for a flawless, long-wear matte red lip.

name: Heat it Pro Insect Bite Healer
description: Relieve itchy insect bites easily with your smartphone. Simply download the heat it™ app (free on Google Play and the Apple App Store), plug this device via its USB-C port into your phone, and allow it to gently warm up the affected skin area to 51°C to reduce itch and pain in as little as four seconds. Comes with BiteLight™ to allow treatment even in the dark. It is suitable for both children and adults, and is compatible with Android smartphones with USB-C outlets and iPhones 15 and newer.

name: Benefit Hoola Matte Bronzer 8g
description: Treat yourself to a sun-kissed look no matter the time of the year with this two-in-one buildable bronzer and contouring powder. Made from an award-winning formula, a light brush of this silky-soft powder gives you a natural-looking, matte glow, whisking you right away into a vacation state of mind.

name: Givenchy Miniature Fragrances Set Eau de Parfum 4 x 10ml
description:
Discover Givenchy’s iconic perfumes for women with this set of four miniature scents. Experience the thrill of the forbidden
with L’Interdit Eau de Parfum and Eau de Parfum Rouge, a fragrance featuring white flowers imbued with black notes. Be
irresistible with Irresistible Eau de Parfum and Eau de Parfum Rose Velvet, woody-fruity florals with accords of luscious rose
and radiant blond wood.

name: Reflex Active Series 30 Amoled Black Smart Calling Watch
description:
Stay connected no matter where you are with this sleek smart watch. Receive calls and notifications directly at your wrist, and remain on track to achieve your wellness goals through nifty features like a step counter, sleep analysis and calorie tracking. Personalise your watch even further with a customisable
AMOLED always-on display and exclusive dials. Comes with IP68 water-resistance and up to 7 days of battery life on a single charge. Two-year guarantee.

name: Anne Klein Twist Ladies’ Watch and Bracelet Set
description: Glam up in an instant with this charming watch and bracelet set. The timepiece comes with a sleek stainless steel mesh band that features a delicate diamond pattern design and a twisting bezel that lets you reveal or hide its shimmering crystals to match your mood and outfit. It is complemented by a matching gold-tone bracelet adorned with charming crystal-accented floral motifs. Wear them separately for understated polish, or together to make a statement. Two-year international warranty. 28mm

name: Calvin Klein Elongated Drops Bangle
description: Inspired by the form of raindrops, this modern bangle features a fluid and organic shape. Its hinged mechanism ensures that it is easy to wear, and makes for a timeless accessory that is perfect worn alone or stacked with other bangles and bracelets. Two-year international warranty.

name: Tommy Hilfiger Stainless Steel Monogram Bracelet
description: Rugged yet classy, this stainless steel chain bracelet adds an edge to any ensemble. Its distinctive and colourful Tommy Hilfiger monogram will put you in the centre of attention with its preppy style. Two-year international warranty.

name: Maison Origine O18è Extrait de Parfum 100ml
description:
Inspired by the romance of Paris’ Montmartre district, this alluring
unisex scent piques the imagination with its heady opening notes of bergamot and cardamom. A delicate heart of lavender and cedarwood pulls you in, before completely enchanting you with its seductive base notes of patchouli, vetiver and sandalwood. The
scent for an unforgettable night out.

name: Jacques du Manoir Ladies’ Inspiration Watch
description:
Stylish and practical, this timepiece was made for the modern woman with its timeless and elegant design. Its sturdy stainless steel case is accented with rhinestones and a gold-tone
bezel, while its face features a date display at 3 o’clock. A matching bracelet and water resistance of up to 5 ATM complete this watch. 26mm

name: Beurer PhysioLine Massage Gun
description: Soothe muscle tension with this palm-sized, portable deep-tissue massage gun. Three intensity levels and three massage attachments allow you to effectively massage all muscle groups including sensitive areas like the neck and jaw. With up to three hours of battery life, this massage gun is the ideal companion even while you’re on the go.

name: Lancome La Vie Est Belle L’Elixir Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Boost your mood with a spritz of this uplifting eau de parfum for women. Top notes of sparkling raspberry and bergamot, a heart of velvety violet leaf and a delicious cocoa butter base come together for a warm, floral scent that celebrates the beauty of life, inspiring you to live every moment to its fullest.

name: Penhaligon’s AlUla Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Journey across saffron deserts where vanilla winds whisper across the horizon. Plum and patchouli rise next to a monolith of spice and tobacco. A fragrance for men and women alike, born of sand and drenched in sky.

name: Fervor Montreal Moroccan Flower Necklace & Earrings Set
description: Inspired by traditional Moroccan geometric art, this 18-carat gold-plated jewellery set sees natural mother of pearl delicately cut and carved into the shape of a wild Moroccan flower, while sparkling diamond simulants adorn the heart of each bloom. The necklace (40cm + 5cm extender) and earrings can be worn together for an effortlessly elegant ensemble, or separately for understated charm.

name: Ex Nihilo Blue Talisman Eau de Parfum 100ml
description:
This captivating unisex fragrance brims with fresh notes of pear,
bergamot, ginger and mandarin. Orange blossom and georgywood
define its heart, while musky amber grounds its base.

EX NIHILO is a Parisian perfume house founded in 2013 by a creative trio. Based out of 352 rue Saint-Honoré in Paris, it revisits the great French High Perfumery tradition with a free-spirited mindset, and collaborates with the most promising artistic talents to push the boundaries of fragrance creation. EX NIHILO, Creator of Future Memories

name: MiLi Smart Speed Accelerated Dual-Port PD Car Charger
description:
Say goodbye to the stress of low phone battery levels after a long flight. With this 12V car fast charger, you can power up your phone quickly and get back to what matters most. Enjoy optimal charging speeds without worrying about voltage fluctuations or overcharging your smartphone, tablet and other USBcompatible
devices. Comes with USB-A and USB-C outlets, and is compatible with both Apple and Android devices.

name: Montblanc Full Acetate Sunglasses
description: These sunglasses feature a sleek rectangular design with smooth, rounded edges. The authentic snowcap emblem enhances its slim temples, while the Montblanc logo is lasered on the right lens. An anti-slip exploded snowcap motif is displayed on the inner end tips, combining elegance with practicality.

name: Swarovski Una Bangle, Octagon-cut, Pavé, Blue, Rhodium-plated
description: Whether you’re heading to the office or a night out in town, this mesmerising bracelet will add a dose of understated glamour to any outfit. At its centre is a vibrant blue, octagon-cut stone that is framed by glittering crystals. A sleek, rhodium-plated band complete with a lobster clasp makes for easy, everyday wear.

name: Diptyque Orphéon Eau de Parfum 75ml
description: Orphéon eau de parfum is a tribute that paints an olfactory portrait of a legendary bar where the founders of Diptyque loved to get together amid curls of tobacco smoke, powdery trails of blusher and burnished wood. At the heart of this composition lies the warmth of tonka bean, the depth of cedar, the richness of jasmine and the vivacity of juniper berries. Suitable for everyone.

name: Elie Saab Le Parfum Eau de Parfum 90ml
description: ELIE SAAB Le Parfum is a sumptuous floral bouquet offering a moment of intense femininity. Notes of orange blossom, shining like the sun at its peak, illuminate an opulent yet delicate jasmine flower. Sweet honey rose and the warmth of patchouli and cedar notes prolong this luminous and profoundly sensual scent. True to its purpose as an “ode to the light”, the Le Parfum bottle is faceted like a jewel; a treasure with pure lines that sparkles and reflects the light infinitely.

name: Habibi Rare Woods Elixir Extrait de Parfum 75ml
description:
Transport yourself to a serene, secluded log house nestled deep within the woods. Imagine settling into a cosy leather chair,
and reading a book as you sip on soothing karak chai. Inspired by the bliss of warm spices and woodsy tranquility, this unisex
parfum captivates with its opening notes of cardamom and ginger, glides into heart notes of black tea and creamy milk, and settles into a base of cedarwood and amber.

name: Fervor Montreal Golden Raindrop Necklace & Earrings Set
description: Add a dash of understated chic to your outfit with this jewellery set. A tarnish-resistant, gold-plated raindrop pendant adorns an Italian-style paper clip chain (45cm). There is also a pair of matching stud earrings. The pieces are perfect worn alone, but even better when paired together.

name: Maserati Epoca Automatic Men’s Watch
description: With its hypnotising emerald-green dial encased in a 42mm stainless steel case, this is a timepiece for the chic and sporty gentleman. An open-heart dial and see-through back casing give a glimpse into the intricate workmanship of this watch. Luminous hands, a stainless steel bracelet, and 100m water resistance lend the watch extra functionality for everyday wear. Two-year international warranty.

name: Bally Ribbon Bifold 8CC Wallet
description: Featuring eight card slots, two cash compartments, and adorned with the iconic Bally Stripe, this luxurious black grained leather wallet is perfect for the classy gentleman who seeks the perfect balance between form and function. Two additional discreet pockets under the card slots help to keep your essentials organised.

name: Buckley London Ruby Halo Necklace & Earrings Set
description: Infuse timeless glamour into your ensemble with this elegant jewellery set. The necklace is adorned with a dazzling round-cut ruby set in a rhodium-plated pendant, and can be worn with the matching studs to make a statement. Comes in a Buckley London gift box.

name: Banyan Tree Lavender and Bergamot Sleep Enhancer Pillow Mist 90ml
description: Sink into deep, undisturbed sleep with this relaxing pillow mist. Specially concocted with essential oils of relaxant properties, it helps to relieve stress and anxiety, soothe the mind and encourage deep rest.

name: Boss Bottled Elixir Parfum 100ml
description: Modern masculinity finds an expression in this seductively woody fragrance. Warm incense top notes, an enticing vetiver heart, and a cedarwood base come together to create a scent that is charming, confident, and alluring all at once.

name: HudaBeauty Easy Bake Loose & Setting Powder 20g
description: Easy Bake’s weightless texture blends seamlessly with any prior product to keep makeup in place without flashback. Ultra-refined pigments give this loose powder a lightweight, silky texture that is non-comedogenic, while offering a hint of luminosity to the skin. Available in the shade Banana Bread.

name: Kiehl's Powerful-Strength Line-Reducing Concentrate 50ml
description: Visibly reduce wrinkles and fine lines with this powerful vitamin C serum. Kiehl’s original formula, infused with 10.5% pure vitamin C, now contains an additional 2% of Vitamin Cg for increased potency, as well as fragmented hyaluronic acid to help instantly smooth skin. In a clinical study, this powerful serum immediately decreased the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and improved skin radiance and texture. The appearance of forehead lines, marionette lines and deep-set wrinkles were also reduced after four weeks. Use in the morning and night to experience its warming sensation and fresh citrus scent. Dermatologist-tested for safety and gentle enough for sensitive skin.

name: Emirates A380 1:250 Scale Aircraft Model
description: Let your imagination take flight with this replica of Emirates’ flagship A380 aircraft. Finely painted and complete with window and engine details, it makes for the perfect work desk accessory to inspire your next trip. It clips to the stand and is made from hollow plastic.

name: The Line Mini Skyline of Dubai
description: Take a piece of Dubai home with you with this multi-functional decoration. In a single stroke, it illustrates the skyline of Dubai — including iconic landmarks like the Emirates Towers, the Churchill Tower and the impressive Burj Khalifa — as seen from the banks of the river. It can be stuck on walls, magnetised to adhere to refrigerators, or simply placed on your desk as a beautiful ornament.

name: Coach Elliot Ladies' Watch
description:
Delicate, modern, and undeniably pretty, this rose gold watch is a classic timepiece. Its sleek mesh bracelet, domed hour markers and a Coach tea rose motif at 12 o’clock, come together for an
elegant and minimalist watch suited for everyday wear. Two-year international warranty.

name: Gemma Natural Diamond & White Gold Necklace
description: Featuring a unique sparkle from every angle, this standalone statement piece showcases 8-pointer natural diamonds in a dazzling round brilliant cut, elegantly set in a solitaire setting in 18-carat white gold. Its understated elegance makes it perfect for layering with other jewellery pieces. Pair it with the matching bracelet for a stunning complementary set.

name: Police Creed Men's Watch
description: A symbol of audacity, this multi-functional watch features a transparent tinted charcoal dial with a brushed black radial finish, set in a unique tonneau-shaped case. It blends style and functionality in a bold design. Water resistance of up to 5 ATM. Two-year international warranty. 42mm

name: Gemma Natural Diamond & White Gold Necklace
description: This white gold bracelet features stunning 5-pointer natural diamonds in a sparkling round brilliant cut, elegantly set in a solitaire setting. Its easy-to-wear design makes it pair effortlessly with any outfit or accessory. Combine it with the matching necklace to elevate your look with an elegant touch.

name: Hot Diamonds x Jac Jossa Believe Pendant
description: Crafted from 925 sterling silver and plated in 18-carat gold, this necklace dazzles with its unique pendant (measuring 26 x 29mm) that features hand-set diamonds. An adjustable chain (40–45cm) makes this necklace suitable to jazz up any outfit as a statement piece, or as an everyday accessory.

name: Cerruti 1881 Regina Bracelet
description:
Reimagining regal beauty, this bracelet features a crown-inspired charm adorned with lustrous accents. A delicate chain, dotted
with clear crystals, adds an enchanting touch.

name: Aquavault Magnetic Wallet with Phone Grip
description: Travel light with this sleek magnetic wallet that attaches easily and securely to your phone. Holding up to six cards and cash, this wallet attaches using ultra-strong magnets, and comes with a handy non-slip loop to ensure an ergonomic grip at all times. Compatible with accessories such as Magsafe and magnetic phone cases, and with all other devices using the included magnetic plate.

name: JBL Go 4 Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Black)
description:
Bring JBL’s clear sound and rich, punchy bass with you wherever
you go. The Go 4 portable speaker fits in the palm of your hand,
and features a newly redesigned integrated loop so it is easy to
carry around, whether you’re heading to the beach or pool.
It is waterproof, dustproof, and is Auracast TM-enabled,
which means it offers unlimited connectivity options: Connect your Go 4 wirelessly to any Bluetooth enabled device, pair two Go 4s to enjoy stereo sound, or enjoy multi-speaker pairing across different devices. A single charge gives you up to seven hours of playtime. Available in black.

name: Hermès Barénia Eau de Parfum 100ml
description:
Free-spirited and elegant, perfumer Christine Nagel’s latest creation for Hermès is a feminine chypre fragrance composed of woody and sensual notes. Oakwood and intense patchouli open the scent, while exhilarating butterfly lily and delicate miracle
berry lie at its heart. Expressing the instinctive, captivating aspects of a woman, this perfume blends strength and softness, and comes in a bottle inspired by Hermès’ iconic Collier de Chien bracelet.

name: Alexandre.J Art Nouveau Collection Eau de Parfum 2 x 25ml
description: This set features two of Alexandre.J’s most iconic, bestselling fragrances: Imperial Peacock and Majestic Nard. Specially crafted in 25ml sizes to elevate your travel journey, a spritz of Majestic Nard wraps you in spicy, woody notes of pink pepper, patchouli and saffron, while Imperial Peacock’s gourmand notes of almond, rhubarb and tonka bean are perfect for the evening. Wear them solo or layered to create a signature scent as unique as you are. Unisex.

name: Versace Dylan Blue Eau de Toilette 100ml
description:
A strong, masculine fragrance. This highly distinctive scent
captures the sensual qualities of the Mediterranean with its
fragrant, woody aroma. Its strong aquatic notes are balanced by
citrus hints of bergamot and grapefruit, while spicy notes of rare
saffron and musk sit at its base. This is a fragrance full of character
and individuality — the ideal expression of a man’s strength.

name: Bowers & Wilkins Pi8 In-Ear True Wireless Earbuds
description:
Setting the new standard for earbuds, the stylish Pi8 comes with an industrial design that combines premium materials and an ergonomic fit to ensure a comfortable experience. Its class-leading audio performance offers crystal-clear call quality, reduced distortion and improved high-frequency detail that capture nuances in your music, while advanced noise-cancellation technology automatically adapts to your surroundings for uninterrupted sound and call performance. Connects wirelessly to external entertainment systems with a standard adaptor^.
Available in Anthracite Black.
^ Smartcase connects to the Emirates ice Inflight Entertainment System with a standard 2-pin to 3.5mm adaptor (not included).

name: Clarins Double Serum 50ml
description:
Suitable for all skin types, this popular Clarins serum is two power-packed serums in one. A complete age-defying concentrate1, it
contains 22 powerful plant extracts, including turmeric and five active molecules, that visibly improve the skin’s firmness and radiance, while reducing the appearance of wrinkles and pores.

name: Flexiroam 10GB Roaming Data, 130+ Countries (Free SIM / eSIM)
description:
Skip the queues and be connected immediately upon arrival.
Get 10GB of high-speed Mobile Roaming Data to use in 130+
countries, complimentary SIM or eSIM card included. Valid for
180 days from first usage. Countries included are: Albania, Algeria, Andorra, Argentina, Armenia, Australia, Austria, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Belarus, Belgium, Belize, Benin, Bolivia, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Botswana, Brazil, Brunei, Bulgaria, Cambodia, Canada, Chad, Chile, China, Colombia, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Costa Rica, Ivory Coast (Côte d’Ivoire), Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Egypt, El Salvador, Estonia, Faroe Islands, Fiji, Finland, France, Gabon, Gambia, Georgia, Germany, Ghana, Gibraltar, Greece, Guernsey, Guinea, Guyana, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Jersey, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Kuwait, Laos, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Macau, North Macedonia, Madagascar, Malaysia, Mali, Malta, Mexico, Moldova, Monaco, Mongolia, Montenegro, Morocco, Mozambique, Netherlands, New Zealand, Nicaragua, Niger, Nigeria, Norway, Oman, Pakistan, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Réunion, Romania, Rwanda, San Marino, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Seychelles, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, South Korea, Spain, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Tanzania, Thailand, Timor-Leste, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, Turkey, Turks and Caicos Islands, United States Virgin Islands, Uganda, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, Uruguay, Uzbekistan, Vietnam, Yemen, Zambia.

name: Clive Christian Matsukita Parfum 50ml
description:
Inspired by a Japanese princess who charmed the Victorian court, this unisex perfume captures her mesmerising grace with its
chypre accords. Opening notes of bergamot dance with sparkling pink pepper before gliding into a sensual heart of jasmine and
smoky mate tea. The perfume rounds off with warm base notes of amber and musk.

name: Sudio A1 Pro Earbuds (Black)
description: Combining function and style, these lightweight earbuds pack in a punch with their impressive features. From active noise cancellation to water and sweat resistance, a deep bass, and up to 5 hours of play time on one charge, these Bluetooth earbuds will become your go-to companion on daily commutes and phone calls.

name: NARS Afterglow Liquid Blush O Peachy pink with golden shimmer, 7ml
description: Loaded with hydrating skincare benefits, this liquid blush creates a lasting, natural-looking glow with a seamlessly silky formula. Its lightweight, ultra-creamy texture applies easily for transfer-resistant cheek colour, and builds and blends without streaking. It is infused with sodium hyaluronate for eight-hour hydration, and vegan protein for healthy-looking skin. Apply a small amount for a light flush, or layer and build for greater intensity.

name: Yolo Kids’ Camera
description: Unleash your child’s creativity with this adorable camera! Built tough for little hands and designed for capturing fun-filled moments, it snaps colourful photos and records videos. With cool effects and filters, easy controls, a durable design and games, this camera is perfect for capturing everyday adventures in a playful way. It features a 2-inch IPS screen, 1920p video recording, one-click photo capture and selfie mode, and supports SD cards up to 32GB in size. Charging cable and memory card included.

name: The Tinted Balm Trio
description: Formulated with a hydrating blend of plant-based butters and oils including shea butter, vitamin E and candelilla wax, this trio of lip balms enhances lips with a sheer, yet buildable wash of colour. They are powered by Augustinus Bader’s TFC8® technology, which nourishes and plumps the lips, protecting them from environmental stressors so they are softer, smoother and healthier-looking than before. They were created in collaboration with filmmaker Sofia Coppola, and come in three shades: a sheer deep pink, a bright red coral and a burnt, earthy plum.

name: Eros Najim Parfum 100ml
description: Enigmatic and enticing, this masculine fragrance opens with top notes of caramel and Italian mandarin, which give way to woody and spicy accords of oud and cardamom. At its heart lies the smoky elegance of incense, as well as the warmth of patchouli and vetiver. Available for a limited time in the Middle East and on board your Emirates flight.

name: Eladaria Eau de Parfum 75ml
description: This enchanting feminine fragrance embodies the essence of a garden reawakening during a misty dawn. Radiant and refreshing, it features top notes of mandarin, which are gently warmed by the soft spice of pink pepper. This blooms into a heart of rose, which dances with delicate peony and lily of the valley, before settling into a sumptuous base of cashmere wood, vanilla and musk for a subtle sweetness and warmth

name: Buckley London - Set of 3 mesh bracelets with rondelles
description: The Mesh Stretch Bracelet with Three Rondelles is a stylish and versatile piece. Featuring a mesh design that stretches for a comfortable fit, this bracelet is adorned with three rondelle hearts. The rondelles feature in gold, rose gold and silver, which makes this a great pairing piece.

name: Inspiration Business
description: Timeless and elegant, this Swiss made timepiece features a classic shape, and a durable 40mm stainless steel case and bracelet. Its unisex design boasts a three-hand movement, a date function, and a standout green dial that will catch the eye and elevate any outfit. Water-resistant up to 5 ATM.

name: 6-in-1 Wireless Charger with Bluetooth Speaker, Pixel Display & Clock Function
description:
Simplify your space with this nifty 6-in-1
wireless charging hub. Seamlessly charge your
smartphone, smartwatch and earbuds while
enjoying your favourite tunes from its Bluetooth
speaker. A smart digital clock and a vibrant
pixel art display put the cherry on top of this
compact and stylish tech hub.

name: Hyperbola Hoop Earrings
description:
Step into the spotlight with these dazzling earrings. On each side, three mini rose-gold-plated hoops are set with round- and square-cut zirconia that
sparkle under the light. Wear them with the matching Hyperbola necklace for a show-stopping look.

name: Tom Ford Rose Exposed 50ml
description:
This perfume reveals a flash of the flower at its peak; a pristine beauty
with a wild side, wrapped in supple leather. Part of Tom Ford’s Private
Blend collection, it opens with a co-distillation note of rose absolute and
rosewater extract. Seductive accords of black leather and white pepper
slowly unfurl, creating a captivating scent for the men and women who
embody unforgettable allure.

name: Drunk Elephant Protini™ Polypeptide Cream 50ml
description:
Revitalise your skin with this featherlight gel-cream
that hydrates the skin while delivering a potent
powerhouse blend of peptides, amino acids and
growth factors to improve the skin’s elasticity and
skin tone. Vegan, fragrance-free, cruelty-free and
dermatologist tested, it is perfect for maintaining
your daily glow.

name: Sammy Ladies' watch
description:
Designed with a modern minimalist sensibility, this timepiece is the perfect everyday accessory. It features a gold-tone stainless steel
bracelet, and a dial with the signature Coach logo and polished gold-tone markers. Two-year international warranty.

name: Volume Enhancing Foam Thinning Hair Solution 55ml
description:
Say goodbye to fine, thinning hair with this unisex
hair enhancer. Powered by BioPeptin Complex®,
its lightweight, award-winning formula nourishes
the hair from root to tip, and boosts fullness and
shine while defending against breakage. It also
conditions the scalp to create an environment that
promotes thicker and healthier hair

name: 24K Gold Toothbrush & Mini Toothpaste Travel Essentials Set Travel in style with this 24-carat
description:
Travel in style with this 24-carat gold-plated, soft-bristle
toothbrush. It is made in Switzerland, and comes with a
refreshing fluoride-free whitening toothpaste infused with
menthol and 24-carat gold particles.

name: Just Cavalli Snake Watch
description:
Turn heads with this serpent-inspired
timepiece. With its elegant pearltoned 22mm face — complete with a
snakeskin motif case — and a sleek,
wraparound stainless steel bracelet,
this watch is for the lady who wants to
make a statement. Water-resistant up to
3 ATM. Two-year international warranty.

name: Burberry Hero Parfum 100ml
description:
Exude pure confidence with this perfume’s
deep, seductive blend of amyris, cypriol oil and
a trio of cedarwood oils. Potent and rich with
resinous notes, this is the fragrance for the
modern man who seeks to bring out the best
in himself.

name: Break-Away Diamond Earrings & Necklace Set
description:
Break away from the ordinary with these radiant, handcrafted 925 sterling silver earrings and necklace (40–45cm). Five ethically sourced, natural white
diamonds sit at the heart of the necklace, while 12 adorn a pair of timeless earrings. Their sleek and modern silhouettes add laidback sophistication
to any look. A diamond day, every day. Buy this set on board to enjoy savings of 30% off its regular retail price. Two-year international warranty.

name: Wallet Soft in Hi-Tech Leather
description:
A must-have for minimalists, this ultra-thin wallet is crafted from
genuine Italian leather and comes with RFID protection. It offers
seven compartments to keep your cash, cards and essentials
secure, yet stays compact enough to fit in your pocket.
Two-year international warranty.
Size: 10.3 x 8 x 0.4cm

name: Valaya Eau de Parfum 75ml
description:
A clean and floral expression of
femininity, this delicate eau de
parfum captivates like a summer
breeze with vibrant top notes
of bergamot and mandarin. A
charming heart of orange flower
and vetiver eventually blooms
into a sensual base of musk and
Akigalawood, leaving a subtle,
unforgettable trail.

name: Shooting Star Necklace & Earrings Set
description:
This jewellery set was inspired by the belief that wishes come true when made upon a shooting star. Beautifully
hand polished and plated in gold, it includes a necklace (40–45cm) and a matching pair of half hoop earrings.

name: Infinity Bangle
description:
This elegant, high polish bangle (6.2cm in diameter) is made from four
tarnish-resistant bangles fused as one. Plated in dazzling gold, it is a
classic piece that will remain a staple in your jewellery box.

name: Travel Diaries Kids’ Jewellery Set
description:
Take your little princess on a magical journey with
this cute 18-carat gold-plated jewellery set. Every
piece features an adorable suitcase motif, while the
necklace (35+5cm) and bracelet (16cm) are also
adorned with charms in the shapes of a passport,
a pair of sunglasses hand painted in pink enamel,
as well as an airplane encrusted with sparkling
cubic zirconia. They are hypoallergenic, and come
packaged in an adorable jewellery box in the shape
of a mini suitcase.

name: Be Delicious Duo Eau de Parfum 2 x 30ml
description:
Tantalise the senses with these two iconic
DKNY eau de parfums for her. Be Delicious
thrills with a burst of juicy apples and magnolia,
while Fresh Blossom captivates with an exotic
mix of grapefruit, rose and jasmine. They come
in 30ml sizes, and are perfect to accompany
you wherever you go.

name: Rose Mouthwash
description:
Elevate your daily ritual with this rose-scented mouthwash. Pure
rosewater lends a subtle floral flavour, while the elegant frosted bottle
makes for a beautiful addition to your bathroom counter. Simply add six
drops to a small glass of water every morning and night before rinsing
your mouth, to keep your breath delicately scented all day long.

name: Titanium Eau de Parfum 50ml
description:
Leave a lasting impression with this masculine eau de parfum. Vibrant top notes
of pink pepper and cardamom capture the senses, while luxe leather, cedarwood
and cinnamon create a warm, magnetic heart. Smooth vanilla and patchouli
leave a captivating trail, making this a bold scent for the driven gentleman.

name: Sacred Bond Extrait de Parfum 75ml
description:
Turn heads with this hypnotic scent that
opens with juicy notes of raspberry and
sparkling bergamot, before melting into
a lush floral heart of jasmine, gardenia
and rose. Warm saffron, creamy
sandalwood and golden caramel linger
on the skin, leaving a trail of vanilla,
amber and white musk

name: Modern Love Bracelet
description:
18-Carat Solid Gold Embrace understated luxury with this bracelet from Jawhara’s Modern Love collection. Finely crafted in Italy with exquisite
precision, it is delicately lightweight at 0.8g, yet speaks volumes with its sophisticated lock- and key-shaped charms.
Timeless and refined, it is perfect for those with a taste for modern elegance.

name: Golden Samples of Love Kit Extrait de Parfum 6 x 10ml
description:
Discover a luxurious collection of extrait de
parfum minis, designed for the true scent
connoisseur. This set includes six of Maison
Origine’s signature unisex scents: OIer,
O7è, O10è, O18è , Rawdah and Shamsa.
Establish your own signature scent by
layering or blending them, or just using each
exquisite fragrance on its own.

name: First Class Lip & Cheek Tints Trio 3 x 6ml
description:
These blendable, long-lasting tints melt
seamlessly into your skin, delivering a natural
flush to your lips and cheeks. This set includes
three full-size tints in the shades Benetint (the
iconic natural rose hue), Floratint (a desert-rose
shade) and Playtint (a pink-lemonade tint).
Mix and match them for endless options.

name: Avery Chronograph Watch
description:
Sleek sophistication meets everyday function in this chronograph watch. Crafted in
stainless steel, it features a green brushed dial with diamond-cut subeyes and a link
bracelet, and is the perfect companion for business meetings, travel or any occasion that
calls for refined elegance. Water-resistant up to 5 ATM. Two-year international warranty.

name: Gentleman Society Ambrée Eau de Parfum 100ml
description:
The Gentleman Society opens its doors to
a world more flamboyant than ever with
Givenchy’s new eau de parfum ambrée,
whose bold signature is adorned in gold for
gentlemen who live and reveal themselves
in the spotlight. This woody floral fragrance
is enhanced with an addictive new ambery
facet, sensual notes of Tasuki vanilla from
Madagascar, narcissus blooms, rich vetiver,
warm notes of leather and tobacco.

name: Gentle Fluidity Gold Eau de Parfum 70ml
description:
This ambery scent opens with juniper berries
that sparkle against a heart of nutmeg and
spicy-citrusy coriander seeds, before settling
into creamy vanilla accords. Luminous and
sophisticated, it creates an aura of warmth and
is designed to be equally captivating, whether
worn by men or women.

name: L’Interdit Absolu Eau De Parfum Intense 80m
description:
Discover L’Interdit Absolu, the new intense
fragrance by Givenchy. The iconic white flower
of L’Interdit is paired with tobacco absolute,
neroli, tuberose, rich woods, patchouli and
vetiver, for a smoky, warm signature blurring
the codes between genders. A fragrance
for women, men and all those who have the
courage to express their own singularity.
Chase your own limits.

name: Ultra Thin Re_Silver Watch
description:
Durability meets elegance in this
modern timepiece. A brushed and
polished 316L stainless steel case
creates a refined yet rugged look,
while a matte black dial pops against
the cool grey case. An integrated
bracelet and hidden butterfly clasp
ensures a seamless fit.

name: Déclaration Eau de Parfum 100ml
description:
Showcase your individuality with this woodyfloral fragrance designed for the modern
man. Sparkling bergamot melds with spicy
pink pepper before revealing a warm heart
of cardamom and cedar. Leather and vetiver
linger on the skin, leaving a sophisticated,
unforgettable trail. A timeless signature of
passion and individuality.

name: MiTag iOS and Android Tracker Duo
description:
Travel confidently with the world’s first Apple
and Google-compatible Bluetooth tracker. Slim,
lightweight and durable, this MiTag offers realtime location updates, customisable alerts and
seamless integration with Apple’s Find My and
Google’s Find My Device apps. Simply attach
MiTag to your keys, luggage or valuables, and
experience peace of mind wherever you go.

name: Beach Charm Bracelet
description:
Capture the essence of the ocean with this stainless steel,
18-carat yellow gold-plated charm bracelet. Featuring a T-bar
closure, freshwater pearls, playful shells and a coin charm
engraved with the words “Live Laugh Lounge”, it is the perfect
keepsake to remind you of your sun-soaked adventures.

name: AX4180 Men’s Chronograph Watch
description:
Command attention day or night with this bold
chronograph watch. With its gold-tone stainless
steel case and bracelet, and a striking black dial,
this timepiece blends the contemporary with the
classic. Precision quartz movement and water
resistance of up to 5 ATM ensure both style and
substance

name: Beach Charm Necklace
description:
Embrace the magic of the sea with this stainless steel, 18-carat yellow
gold-plated charm necklace (40–45cm). A bold sun pendant shines at
its heart, and it also features freshwater pearls and whimsical
starfish and heart motif charms, making it a necklace which
tells a story of warmth, love and seaside adventures.

name: Hyperbola Necklace
description:
Make every day feel extraordinary with this stunning necklace. Three mini rose-gold and rhodium-plated
hoops sparkle with round- and square-cut zirconia that catch the light, and are suspended from a delicate
adjustable chain (38–45cm). Style it with the matching Hyperbola hoop earrings to elevate your outfit.

name: Pulse Ladies’ Watch
description:
With its wide, stainless steel mesh bracelet, sunray gold-tone dial, and water resistance of up to 3 ATM, this watch will take you effortlessly
from the boardroom to the ballroom, as well as everywhere else in between. Two-year international warranty.

name: Casual Men’s Watch
description:
This sleek timepiece boasts polished silver accents and a bold navy dial that embodies
modern elegance. A multifunction display and supple leather strap offer precision and
comfort, making this watch ideal for both business and leisure. Water-resistant up to
5 ATM. Two-year international warranty.

name: Oudgasm Rose Oud | 16 Hair Mist 75ml
description:
Uplift your senses and refresh your hair
with a spritz of this nourishing, alcohol-free
hair mist. A decadent fusion of Bulgarian
rose, Madagascan vanilla and luxurious
oud indulges the senses, while powerhouse
ingredients like camellia oil, argan oil and
aloe vera soften and hydrate each strand.

name: Ceramide Capsules Trio Tin 3 x 7 Capsules
description:
Enjoy radiant, youthful skin wherever you go with
this travel-friendly serum set. This tin includes
three of Elizabeth Arden’s signature Ceramide
formulations: Hyaluronic Acid Ceramide, Retinol
+ HPR Ceramide and Advanced Ceramide, which
smooth, firm and hydrate the skin. Each capsule
delivers a fresh, potent dose of skin-nourishing
supplements, leaving your complexion supple
and glowing.

name: La Mer The Renewal Oil 30ml
description:
Awaken your skin’s radiance with this multi-tasking
treatment oil. Suitable for skin, hair and cuticles,
this fast-absorbing oil blends La Mer’s signature
Miracle Broth™ with other potent oils to deeply
nourish, smooth and restore. Just a few drops
softens lines, boosts firmness, and leaves skin
luminous and supple.

name: Expert Sun Protector Clear Stick SPF 50+ 20g
description:
Have fun in the sun without worrying about skin
damage! This lightweight and water-resistant
sunscreen stick protects your skin without leaving
any chalky residue or a greasy feel. Shiseido’s
SynchroShield™ technology offers a protective
veil that is strengthened by heat, water and
perspiration*, while its SuperVeil-UV 360™
technology defends against UVA and UVB rays,
micro dust and dryness*. A new argan oil formula
keeps your skin hydrated for eight hours**, while
an anti-pollution technology, NatureSurgeComplex,
protects your skin against oxidative damage.

name: Narciso Rodriguez For Her Eau de Parfum Intense 100ml
description:
Created for the woman who makes an
impression wherever she goes, this
captivating fragrance cocoons you in a veil
of sensual musk, vanilla and fruity peach
notes that linger beautifully on the skin.
More intense than its original formula, this
scent creates an unforgettable signature
that is both mysterious and inviting.

name: Voya African Lime and Clove Luxury Scented Candle 200ml
description:
Strike a match and awaken your senses. Crafted from natural soybean
wax and essential oils, this scented candle perfumes any space with
sparkling notes of lime, lemon, crisp herbs and warm spicy cloves, all
softened by a whisper of patchouli. Burning cleanly for up to 30 hours,
this is a candle for days when you need an extra boost of clarity.

name: Maison Margiela Replica Discovery Set Eau de Toilette 4 x 7ml
description:
Wrap yourself up in the cosy memories of
autumn and winter with this curated collection
of these seasons’ most characteristic scents.
From crisp leaves to warm evenings by
the fireside, each fragrance evokes distinct
experiences and invites you on a sensory
journey. The scents can be worn on their own
or layered. This set comprises the Replica
fragrances Lazy Sunday Morning, Jazz Club,
By the Fireplace and On A Date, and is ideal
as a gift.

name: Voya Feel The Heat Body Warming Gel 100ml
description:
Ease tension in the body with this gel that gently warms upon massage.
Infused with deeply hydrating seaweed, naturally soothing ingredients
like arnica and comfrey, this product is also scented with uplifting notes
of ginger and sweet orange. A simple 10-minute massage with this
warming gel will leave you feeling refreshed and ready to take on the day.

name: Xerjoff Naxos Eau de Parfum 100ml
description:
Be transported into the heart of Sicily with
this fresh, unisex fragrance that celebrates
the magic of the Italian city. Opening with a
zesty bouquet of bergamot and lavender, this
scent blooms into a sweet heart of honey
and cashmere before settling into warm,
deep notes of tobacco and tonka bean.
Spritz it on when you feel the need for an
extra dose of charm and magnetism.

name: Coti Vision Shanti Beaded Glasses Chain
description:
Whether you’re discovering the wonders of a new city or sunbathing on a beach, this stylish, lightweight beaded glasses chain keeps your eyewear
secure and always within reach. It is crafted with elegant white and gold beads, and is the perfect accessory for any adventure.

name: Lancôme L’Absolu Rouge Trio Lipsticks 3 x 3.4g
description:
Nourish your lips with your favourite Lancôme
nude shade. This trio of lipsticks is packed with
an advanced replenishing formula powered by
pro-xylane, and offers both a pop of colour and
welcome hydration. There are three nude hues
to discover: Shades 01 Universelle, 250 Tendre
Mirage and 217 Nude Shot.

name: Kayali Vanilla | 28 Eau de Parfum 50ml
description:
Pure indulgence in a bottle. This gourmand
scent envelops you in creamy jasmine,
naturally sourced Madagascan vanilla, warm
brown sugar and velvety Tonka. Luxurious
and decadent, it’s perfect worn alone, or as a
delicious accent on top of your favourite scent.

name: Lancôme L’Absolu New Harmony Palette
description:
Combining the best of Lancôme’s makeup
essentials, this all-in-one palette takes you from
day to night with its range of lip colours, face
powders and mascaras. Crafted by Lisa Eldridge,
Lancôme’s international makeup artist, this palette
takes inspiration from the latest trends and offers
elegant shades to suit every woman.

name: Kate Sommerville KateCeuticalsTM SuperCell Rejuvenation Serum 30ml
description:
KateCeuticals™ SuperCell Rejuvenation
Serum will have everyone asking for your
secret. This powerhouse combination
of vegan stem cells and active peptides
accelerates cellular turnover, delivering
fresh-from-the-clinic results in the
comfort of your home. Its lightweight
formula boosts collagen production, and
visibly repairs the most severe wrinkles,
fine lines and damage from the sun
and pollution. Reveal healthier-looking,
radiant skin with regular use.

name: Montblanc Emirates Airline Foundation Ballpoint Pen
description: Handcrafted by Montblanc exclusively for Emirates, this pen showcases exquisite craftsmanship, from the stainless-steel cap with the Emirates Airline Foundation motif to a ruby gemstone on the platinum-plated clip. For every pen bought, 10% of sales goes to the Emirates Airline Foundation.

name: Shiseido Ginza Tokyo Expert Sun Protector Lotion SPF 50+ 150ml
description: The perfect tropical getaway begins with a comfortably lightweight, invisible, yet full-coverage sunscreen. Keep your skin protected against dryness, sun damage and oxidation with this SPF 50+ sunscreen that is water- and perspiration-resistant.

name: Make Up For Ever HD Skin All In One Face Palette
description: Get your hands on the latest addition to Make Up For Ever’s bestselling HD Skin collection. Designed to match a variety of skin-tone needs, you can now complete your full routine with one single palette: Unify, correct, conceal, colour, contour and illuminate your complexion with this multiuse, travel friendly cream palette.

name: Roja Apex Pour Homme Travel Set, Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Apex is inspired by man’s connection to the earth and synergy with nature. Animalic notes of leather, ambergris and musk tread an earthy base of patchouli and sandalwood, and hide beneath a canopy of green notes and tropical fruits. Includes a free refillable 7.5ml atomiser.

name: Emirates Playing Cards
description: Add flair to game night with our high quality plastic Emirates-themed playing cards. Our latest editions come with newly designed face cards and box design; collect all four to see Emirates' fleet and cabin crew take to the skies. It's the perfect gift to remember each of your flights with us, and for a souvenir unlike any other.
